programme.title: An Bord des Mclaren 570S Spider
programme.desc: Wir fahren mit dem McLaren 570S Spider ein wenig durchs Gebirge und geniessen den schönen Tag.

programme.title: Crash
programme.desc: When ambition exceeds driving ability and when well-secured racing pros are carried out of the bend, we are there with the camera. Breathtaking stunts of professional drivers and slapsticks of high-powered sheet metal bullets. Spectacular scenes in which no one is harmed.

programme.title: Streetwise
programme.desc: We took the Ferrari 458 Italia for a spring ride around Lake Starnberg. Also: a test drive of BMW's 6 series convertible at the Table Mountain in South Africa. And: the Chevrolet Orlando family van.

programme.title: Streetwise
programme.desc: Audi built only 333 units of its GT model. We tested the everyday use compatibility of the R8 GT. In addition: the Mazda MX5, the most popular roadster in the world. And: the Mercedes-AMG GT3.

programme.title: Streetwise
programme.desc: More efficiency, less weight and more sportiness is what Audi promotes in order to win the race against BMW and Mercedes with their A6 2.0 TDI. Also: Patrick Dempsey and his racing team at the Grand Am Rolex Sportscar GT series.

programme.title: Streetwise
programme.desc: We put the Wiesmann MF5 at the racetrack in Spa-Francochamps in the Belgian Ardennes to the test. Also: Audi A1 vs. Mini Cooper RS. And: the GT Academy 2011 qualifying rounds.

programme.title: Streetwise
programme.desc: The Nurburgring 24 Hours is considered the most difficult long distance race in motor sports. Volkswagen set themselves this challenge with a car built especially for this occasion, their Golf 24.

programme.title: Streetwise
programme.desc: The Mercedes-Benz SL 65 AMG is the ultimate German muscle car in a tailor-made suit. Also: the Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG, the Formula 1 safety car. And: BMW's 6 series models.

programme.title: Jaguar D-Type
programme.desc: The high-achiever at the 24 hours of Le Mans. The Jaguar D-Type won the toughest endurance race in the world three times in a row.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The 1971 BMW 02 Touring was considered an ugly duckling at the time, but is now a coveted car. Also: the solid technology and moderate prices of the Mercedes-Benz 114/115 made them the first "people's Mercedes".

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: In the 1950s, companies like Tatra from Czechoslovakia introduced advanced, even pioneering automobiles. The clientele was exclusive, which is why now these streamlined cars are big rarities. We tracked down the owner of a 1937 Tatra T87.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The Porsche 911 Targa with its lightweight construction is an iconic car. Also: the Lotus Seven Twin Cam SS is more pf a race than a road car. And: the 1930 Bentley Blower and the dainty British roadster, the Sunbeam Tiger.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The 1967 Ford Fairlane GTA in NASCAR trim. Also: the 1995 Chrysler 300 C was the most powerful production vehicle in the US. And: the 1949 Cadillac Series 62 convertible set new standards in terms of luxury.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The 1947 Triumph 1800 Roadster provides space for 5 fresh air fans. Also: Le Jog, the toughest classic car rally in Europe. A German women's team takes on the challenge in their VW Iltis. And: a charming oldie, the 1919 Wolseley Stellite.

programme.title: Facel Vega Facellia
programme.desc: In the late 1950s, the Facel Vega Facellia was designed to compete with Porsche and Alfa Romeo and open a new market segment for the fledgling French luxury car company.

programme.title: BMW M3
programme.desc: In the late 80s BMW brought a car onto the market which carried true racing genes. Initially conceived as a homologation model for the German Touring Car Championship, it developed into being one of the world's hottest street sports car. Whenever its name is mentioned, car fans feel goosebumps - even today: the BMW M3.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: McLaren is one of the most famous automobile brands from Great Britain. There are hardly any sports cars that fascinate as much as a McLaren or have such a legendary heritage in motorsports. Two recent models from McLaren are the 650S and the limited series P1. Supercars is in the mood for love and dates the McLaren 650S at an old industrial area and on the race track.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: There are details which set super cars apart from normal cars and these details are essential. Super cars are the biggest, loudest and most expensive cars on the highway; they're four-wheeled works of arts.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: In celebration of its 100th anniversary, Maserati rewarded itself with a beautiful coupe called Maserati Alfiere. But that's not all. The company invites to a trip from Bologna to Turin featuring the most beautiful models from the last decades. Supercars takes part in this trip with a Granturismo MC Stradale.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: It’s name is Mulsanne, Bentely Mulsanne. The new flagship from Bentley reaches a top speed of close to 300 km/h, it is luxurious like a first class hotel and elegant like an Armani suit. Supercars reveals how it feels like to ride a dream car like this. Plus: Supercars takes a look at the remarkable Rolls Royce Ghost and the high-tech coupé Mercedes S 63 AMG.

programme.title: Volvo XC60
programme.desc: The Swedish landscape is characterized by mountains, forests and lonely roads. Ideal for this off-roader. The Volvo XC60 scores with many safety features and a cool appearance.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: At the old-timer grand prix at the Nürburgring you for example can see the Mercedes S with 160 horsepower that lead Rudolf Caracciola to victory in the 1927 opening race.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: In this episode we focused on Phoenix Racing, the successful team from the Eifel Region that rocked the DTM.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: At the Nürburgring Patrick chased a 12-cylinder Aston Martin Zagato down the track. Also on the show: a Hummer, a Renault Clio and a Frenchman in a Ferrari.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: Visitors from all over the world make their way to the Green Hell of the Nürburgring each year, including many Germans, Austrians and 5 crazy Englishmen in a taxi.

programme.title: Ken Block at the Monza Rallye Show
programme.desc: In Monza, Ken Block is set to compete against Allstars from motorsport at the Monza Rally Show.

programme.title: Put your car on TV
programme.desc: Hosts Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi invite petrol heads from the Middle East to bring their tuned cars to the 'The Walk' at Jumeirah Beach and have it rated in the categories speed, style and sound. Whoever receives the most points, wins a one night stay for two people at this glamorous Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. On this episode, a Chevrolet Camaro and Mercedes SLS AMG try to impress.

programme.title: Put your car on TV
programme.desc: If you want to see out-of-this-world, customized or tuned luxury vehicles or posh cars you need to go to 'The Walk', the glamorous boulevard of Jumeirah Beach. Put Your Car on TV invites car owners to have their vehicles judged by Saif Hattawi. The person with the most points wins a special treat from the Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. Among the presented cars are a BMW X5 and a Mercedes SLK 230.

programme.title: Put your car on TV
programme.desc: People from the Middle East are crazy about their cars. On Put Your Car on TV they have the chance to present their tuned vehicles and judged. They are awarded points based on speed, style and sound and the car owner with the most points, wins a special treat for two from the Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. Among the competitors are a Nova SS, a special Honda Acord and a car full of crystals.

programme.title: Bentley Bentayga
programme.desc: With the Bentley Bentayga, the traditional British brand is entering the fastest growing market segment. This world's first luxury SUV is a conglomerate of superlatives on wheels.

programme.title: Mercedes Sprinter, 2018
programme.desc: The Mercedes Sprinter belongs to the class of commercial vehicles. The light transporter is the dream for every tradesman. The third generation Sprinter is sleeker, more modern and more variable than ever.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Robust, honest, simple, the Land Rover is the bedrock of all off-road vehicles. Built in 1948 as a simple car for British farmers, the vehicle quickly became an export hit. Today, the Land Rover is at home all over the world.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Vive la différence: the cars of Renault are always unusual in design, exceptional in their driving comfort and often avant-gardistic. Renault writes history with the Dauphine, R4, R5 and R16 models.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: From the very beginning, Citroën celebrated the joy of extravagance. Already the Traction Avant from the 1950s is a milestone in automotive history and the 2CV is one of the most unusual and charming small cars ever built.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The Volkswagen Golf is nothing more but a reasonable car - there's nothing really exciting about it, but still it's a mega-seller. The Golf is compatible with the masses and dominates the compact car class since its market introduction.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Be it the 24 Hours of Le Mans, the Monte Carlo Rally or Formula 1: Porsche won it all at least once. Even the first prototype was a race winner, and the successes of the Spyder in the Carrera Panamericana or the Targa Florio are unforgettable.

programme.title: Creme 21 Youngtimer Rally 2019
programme.desc: Welcome to the 80s, the period in time in which there were only three skin creams and three television programs on air and Tuesday night was Dallas night. Car enthusiasts can feel like they’re back in those times once a year at the Creme 21 classic car rally.

programme.title: Chevrolet Corvair
programme.desc: Despite a production number of nearly 1.4 million units the Chevrolet Corvair is virtually unknown in Europe. It was innovative, efficient, modern and cheap. Nevertheless, it was slandered, torn apart and later reviled.

programme.title: Top10 Show
programme.desc: We show what's hot and what's not in the car world. This time we focus on the fastest cars.

programme.title: Top10 Show
programme.desc: Real luxury, the kind of cars most people can only dream of. We present the most expensive production cars.

programme.title: Top10 Show
programme.desc: We present the ten heaviest cars. But there are not only heavy bodies or big vans to see. We have a few surprises up our sleeves.

programme.title: Top10 Show
programme.desc: Day after day, the research and development departments of car manufacturers are working to make their upcoming models unique. We present the ten most unusual cars of the last few years.

programme.title: Top10 Show
programme.desc: The 24-hour race at Germany's Nürburgring is one of the most famous and dangerous endurance races in the world. We show those cars that have won the most titles.

programme.title: Top10 Show
programme.desc: Fuel prices continue to rise. That's why in this episode we present ten of the most fuel-efficient cars in the world.

programme.title: Peugeot 205 Turbo 16
programme.desc: Peugeot released this classic, all wheel drive monster for one purpose only: It should bring the World Rally Championship to France. The Peugeot 205 Turbo 16 shook up the rally world in the 80s.

programme.title: FRIDAY NIGHT POKER WEEK 3

programme.title: Poker Masters 2021 Episode 1
programme.desc: The 2021 Poker Masters is underway with Event #1 seeing seven players return and David Peters in control as the chip leader. Peters sits ahead of Brock Wilson, Shannon Shorr, Jonathan Jaffe, Dylan DeStefano, John Riordan, and Ben Yu as they play for the $205,000 first-place prize.

programme.title: Poker Masters 2021 Episode 2
programme.desc: Sean Perry leads the Event #2 final table while John Riordan returns to sit at his second final table of the series. Also in contention are Jeremy Ausmus, Jake Schindler, Sam Soverel, and Daniel Negreanu as the final six play for the $206,400 first-place prize.

programme.title: Poker Masters 2021 Episode 3
programme.desc: The game changes to Pot-Limit Omaha at the 2021 Poker Masters with Matthew Wantman holding the lead. Chris Brewer, Jake Daniels, Adam Hendrix, Brent Roberts, and Jake Schindler are all in the mix for the $186,300 first-place prize.

programme.title: Poker Masters 2021 Episode 4
programme.desc: Brekstyn Schutten holds the lead in Event #4 over the final six players as $189,800 awaits the winner. Trailing Schutten are Chad Eveslage, Nick Petrangelo, Sam Soverel, Elio Fox, and Brock Wilson.

programme.title: WSOP 2004 Bracelet Events $1.5K 7 Card Stud
programme.desc: The star-studded final table of the $1,500 Stud would see WSOP bracelet winners Men Nguyen, Ted Forrest, and Minh Nguyen looking to add more WSOP gold to their trophy case. Chad Brown would be eyeing his first WSOP bracelet as $111,440 in first-place prize money was up for grabs.

programme.title: WSOP 2004 Bracelet Events $1K No-Limit Hold’em
programme.desc: Nearly 800 rebuys would take this field size to 1,334 and a prize pool of over $1.26 million. The final table would be stacked with tournament veterans led by Daniel Negreanu, John Juanda, Mike Matusow, Lee Markholt, Paul Phillips, and Ram Vaswani as all eyes were on the $365,900 first-place prize.

programme.title: WSOP 2004 Bracelet Events $1.5K No-Limit Hold’em
programme.desc: The 831-entrant field created a $1.14 million prize pool in the first $1,500 No-Limit Hold'em event of the 2004 WSOP. Poker author Blair Rodman, and tournament regulars Joe Awada, Scott Epstein, and Kent Washington held seats at the final table, along with "The Crew" member Scott Fischman as the $300,000 first-place prize was up for grabs.

programme.title: WSOP 2004 Bracelet Events $5K No-Limit Hold’em
programme.desc: The biggest No-Limit Hold'em buy-in of the 2004 WSOP outside of the Main Event would attract 254 entrants and create a prize pool of $1,193,800. Barry Greenstein and Dewey Tomko fell short of reaching the final table, as WSOP veterans James Sousa and Paul "Eskimo" Clark headlined the final table ahead of Lee Watkinson, Thomas Keller, Martin de Knijff, and Young Phan as they chased the $382,020 first-place prize.

programme.title: Poker After Dark Hellmuth Bash Cash Game I Episode 19
programme.desc: Week 4: "Hellmuth Bash Cash Game I" features Tom Dwan, Kenny Tran, Phil Laak, Antonio Esfandiari, Phil Hellmuth, and Bob Safai.

programme.title: WSOP 2004 Main Event Day 1A
programme.desc: Day 1A of the 2004 WSOP Main Event is underway with Daniel Negreanu, Men "The Master" Nguyen, and John Hennigan on the feature table. Defending champion Chris Moneymaker kicks off his title defense, while several big names find themselves heading home early.

programme.title: WSOP 2004 Main Event Day 1B
programme.desc: Coverage continues on Day 1B of the WSOP Main Event, and last year's runner-up Sammy Farha headlines the feature table along with John Juanda. Chris Ferguson and "Miami" John Cernuto then join the feature table action, as many poker pros hit the rail on Day 1B.

programme.title: WSOP 2004 Main Event Day 2
programme.desc: Day 2 action in the WSOP Main Event sees Doyle Brunson headline the feature table along with Scott Fischman. Siblings Howard Lederer and Annie Duke are eliminated, along with two previous Main Event champions.

programme.title: WSOP 2004 Main Event Day 3
programme.desc: Money day has arrived in the WSOP Main Event with just 277 players remaining on Day 3. Gus Hansen takes center stage on the feature table, and is joined by Daniel Alaei and Dan Harrington while two other previous champions also survive the day.

programme.title: WSOP 2004 Main Event Day 4
programme.desc: Just 149 players remain in the 2004 WSOP Main Event, and Mike Matusow headlines the feature table alongside Greg "Fossilman" Raymer and John Esposito. However, it would be John Murphy, Josh Arieh, and Marcel Luske climbing to the top of the leaderboard.

programme.title: WSOP 2004 Main Event Day 5
programme.desc: World Champions Dan Harrington and Chris Ferguson headline the feature table on Day 5 of the WSOP Main Event. The only other former champion wouldn't survive, as Doyle Brunson was eliminated.

programme.title: WSOP 2004 Main Event Day 6 (Part 1)
programme.desc: Just 50 players return on Day 6 of the WSOP Main Event as Marcel Luske headlines the feature table along with John Murphy. On the outer tables, Josh Arieh and David Williams begin their run up the leaderboard, while previous champions Chris Ferguson and Dan Harrington remain in contention as just 32 players remain.

programme.title: The Best of Most Controversial/Dramatic
programme.desc: The essential and most memorable hands that defined Poker Night in America. Featuring Mike Matusow, Brandon Cantu, Alec Torelli, Dan Wolfe, Doug Polk, James Calderaro, Shaun Deeb, Hashtag King, Jungleman Cates, Hashtag King.

programme.title: It's Been a While...
programme.desc: $25/$50 cash game action from Seminole Hard Rock, Hollywood, FL featuring Mike Dentale, Joey DiPascale, Matt Glantz, Jonathan Little, Bob Mather, and Shaun Deeb. (Part 1 of 5)

programme.title: Shaun Deeb Is Not My Lover
programme.desc: $25/$50 cash game action from Seminole Hard Rock, Hollywood, FL featuring Mike Dentale, Joey DiPascale, Matt Glantz, Jonathan Little, Bob Mather, and Shaun Deeb. (Part 2 of 5)

programme.title: Paging Rampage
programme.desc: $25/$50 cash game action from Seminole Hard Rock, Hollywood, FL featuring Mike Dentale, Joey DiPascale, Matt Glantz, Jonathan Little, Ethan "Rampage" Yau, and Shaun Deeb. (Part 3 of 5)

programme.title: Don't Wanna Be Like Mike
programme.desc: $25/$50 cash game action from Seminole Hard Rock, Hollywood, FL featuring Mike Dentale, Joey DiPascale, Matt Glantz, Jonathan Little, Ethan "Rampage" Yau, and Shaun Deeb. (Part 4 of 5)

programme.title: It Was Horrible Playing With All of You
programme.desc: $25/$50 cash game action from Seminole Hard Rock, Hollywood, FL featuring Mike Dentale, Joey DiPascale, Matt Glantz, Jonathan Little, Ethan "Rampage" Yau, and Shaun Deeb. (Part 5 of 5)

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 1
programme.desc: Poker Night is back in action at Studio 52 in Las Vegas! Featuring Jason Somerville, MJ Gonzales, Lily Kiletto, Dan Shak, Johnnie Vibes, and Jesse Sylvia.

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 2
programme.desc: The party continues at Studio 52 as we see one of the rarest hands in all of poker. Featuring commentary from Lon McEachern and Phil Galfond. Tonight's lineup: Maria Konnikova, MJ Gonzales, Johnnie Vibes, Darren Rabinowitz, Jesse Sylvia & Cedrric Trevino.

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 3
programme.desc: Phil Galfond makes his Poker Night in America debut playing $25/$50/$100. Lineup: MJ Gonzales, Adam Hendrix, Phil Galfond, Bob Mather, Nick Vertucci, Jeremiah Williams. Commentary by Phil Galfond & Lon McEachern.

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 4
programme.desc: It's LADIES NIGHT at Studio 52 and we're playing $25/$50+. This is one of the most unpredictable tables we've ever had. Featuring Lily Kiletto, Farah Galfond, Hayley Hanna, Christina 'BabyShark' Gollins, Aiza Sison & Lynn Banks! Commentary by Phil Galfond & Lon McEachern.

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 5
programme.desc: MJ Gonzales reads through the soul of a 3-barrel bluff. What else would you expect from Daniel Negreanu's poker coach? Episode 5 features special guest Cody Daniels making his poker night debut. Full Line up: Cody Daniels, MJ Gonzales, Johnnie Vibes, DJ Washburn, Adam Hendrix, Nicky Ringz & Danny Panagatos.

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 6
programme.desc: More $25/$50+ high stakes action from Studio 52 in Las Vegas. Lineup features MJ Gonzales, Adam Hendrix, Christian Soto, Jared Jaffee, Danny Panagatos & Mitchell Bank.

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 7
programme.desc: Tensions rise on the felt as the poker action heats up in this wild $25/$50/$100 high stakes cash game from Studio 52 in Las Vegas. Lineup features Krissy Foxen, Christian Soto, Jared Jaffee, MJ Gonzales, Hayley Hanna & Christina McAlpin.

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 8
programme.desc: The established PROS received BAD intel on Keir Sullivan, not realizing they invited a SHARK to their game. Wild high stakes action $100/$200. Lineup: Shaun Deeb, Ben Lamb, Keir Sullivan, MJ Gonzales, Shane Sigsbee, Craig Stackewicz, Clay Johnson. Commentary by Joe Stapleton.

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 9
programme.desc: If anyone can stop Keir Sullivan's winning streak, it's Shaun Deeb...right? Wild high stakes action $100/$200. Lineup: Shaun Deeb, Ben Lamb, Keir Sullivan, MJ Gonzales, Shane Sigsbee, Craig Stackewicz, Clay Johnson. Commentary by Joe Stapleton.

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 10
programme.desc: More high stakes $100/$200/$400+ featuring Shaun Deeb and friends with commentary from comedian Joe Stapleton - Season 10 Episode 10 filmed in Las Vegas, NV (November 2023). Lineup: Shaun Deeb, Ben Lamb, Keir Sullivan, MJ Gonzales, Shane Sigsbee, Craig Stackewicz, Clay Johnson. Commentary by Joe Stapleton.

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 11
programme.desc: Table Finale of the $100/$200/$400 high stakes poker cash game featuring Shaun Deeb and friends with commentary from comedian Joe Stapleton - Season 10 Episode 11 filmed in Las Vegas, NV (November 2023). Lineup: Shaun Deeb, Ben Lamb, Keir Sullivan, MJ Gonzales, Shane Sigsbee, Craig Stackewicz, Clay Johnson. Commentary by Joe Stapleton.

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 12
programme.desc: Can 9-time NHL All-Star Jeremy Roenick use his aggressive and competitive spirit to outwit a table full of poker sharks or will he be a fish out of water? Watch Jeremy at the Poker Night in America Studio 52 cash game with Jason Somerville, Scott Ball, Jeremiah Williams, Terrance Reid, Jesse Sylvia and Nick Marchington.

programme.title: Studio 52 - Episode 13
programme.desc: Jeremy Roenick fights to survive against bad luck and nasty run outs ($25/$50/$100). Lineup: Jeremy Roenick, Jason Somerville, Scott Ball, TJ Reid, Jesse Sylvia, Nick Marchington, Jeremiah Williams. Commentary by Joe Stapleton.

programme.desc: More from Studio 52 with Jeremy Roenick. ($25/$50/$100). Lineup: Jeremy Roenick, Jason Somerville, Scott Ball, TJ Reid, Jesse Sylvia, Nick Marchington, Jeremiah Williams. Commentary by Joe Stapleton.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 350 - Dynamite Fighting Show 20 Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 20 part 2 from Bucharest Romania with a night of Kickboxing action. Starting off in the heavyweight division, Poland's Dominik Jedrejczyk takes on Romania's Claudiu Badoi in a David versus Goliath fight. Next up, Stefan Orza and Eduard Gafencu look to give fans a fight of the night. In two heavyweight matchups, Florin Ivanoaie faces Cristian Ristea and Ionut Iancu faces Sebastian Cozmanca.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 354 - Fighters Only 15th Annual World Mixed Martial Arts Awards
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Fighters Only 15th Annual World Mixed Martial Arts Awards hosted by Chael Sonnen and honoring Ken Shamrock. These awards honor exceptional performance in various aspects of MMA including: Upset of the Year, Comback of the Year, Ring card Girl of the Year, Gym of the Year, Female and Male Fighter of the Year, Knockout of the Year and Fight of the Year.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 464 - Up Next Fighting 14 part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 14 part 3 from the Commerce Hotel and Casino in Southern California, for an episode packed with action. Up first, Connor Leste and Jason Jones take to the cage in the welterweight division followed by Eden Ibarra versus Gregor Balkian and Atilla Errett versus Amin Derakhshan. In a battle of the Big Island Hawaii, Jake Babian and Kealii Kanekoa step into the cage in the welterweight division while the Somali Sniper Shafii Farah takes on Kester Abad in a flyweight battle.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 420 - Dynamite Fighting Show 25 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 25 part 1 from Oradea, Romania. Starting in the heavyweight division, Remus Bortea is matched up against Vasile Corcodel whose three wins are all by KO. In a Superfight middleweight division bout, Darius Argyo takes on Andrei "The Bonecrusher" Varga in what's expected to be a fast paced bout. Also in this episode is Brazil versus Romania with two very experienced fighters, Rodrigo Mineiro takes on Claudio "The Prince" Badoi in an open weight division fight.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 421 - Dynamite Fighting Show 25 part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 25 part 2 from Oradea, Romania. In the Super Middleweight division Steven Mendes from France takes on Romania's more experienced Andrei Ostrovanu with 42 wins (24 by KO). In an ISKA Cruiserweight World Title match, Vasileios Karagkiozis and Sebastian Lutanic vie for the belt in a Greece versus Romania bout. Also, in an open weight division Tolea Ciumac and Bogdan Nastase face off in a David versus Goliath match

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 422 - Dynamite Fighting Show 25 part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 25 part 3 from Oradea, Romania. Up first in an ISKA Super Middleweight World Title match, Vinicius Bereta of Brazil takes on Adrian Maxim of Romania with the belt on the line. In the Colossal Division with a total of 723 pounds in the ring, Cristian Anheliuc and Sandu Lungu face off. The ISKA Super Middleweight Wordl title is on the line when Camaroon's Brice Kombou takes on Romania's Andrei Leustean.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 405 - Bare Knuckle Boxing 38 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Bare Knuckle Boxing 38 part 1 from London. Starting off is Dan Gittens stepping into the ring with Will Cairns while Pat Nash faces Danny Fletcher both fighters hoping to get their first Bare Knuckle win. George Hillyard challenges Jimmy Bryan making his Bare Knuckle debut. Watch as two powerhouses fight next as Kamil Sokolowski from Poland takes on Ukranian Volodymyr Skurtu. Also in this episode, Brad Scott and Martyn Grainger face off in a cruiserweight title clash and Marko Martinjak current champion trades punches with Kevin Greenwood in a world light heavyweight title challenge.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 406 - Bare Knuckle Boxing 38 part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Bare Knuckle Boxing 38 part 2 from London. Starting off this great night of combat, Eryk Majda steps into the ring with Tyrone Eliffe in what is expected to be the fight of the night in this light heavyweight title fight. Next up defending champion Ionel Levitchi faces challenger Tony Shields for the British lightweight title belt. Watch as Liam Rees and Corey Healey take to the ring in a Wales versus Wales contest in a well matched fight for the flyweight title. Plus you won't want to miss the heavyweight bout between Dominic Negus versus Stanlee Wilson.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 349 - Dynamite Fighting Show 20 Part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 20 part 1 from Bucharest Romania. Watch four kickboxing battles on this episode of UFA. Starting out The Ironman, Denis Ceausu takes on Marius Cimpoeru, then Ali Gokturk Benli faces Andrei Leustean in a Turkey versus Romania bout. Florentin Ionescu takes on the more experienced Mihai Zmarandescu and Omer Pisgin takes on fan favorite The Shephard, Bogdan Nastase.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 350 - Dynamite Fighting Show 20 Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 20 part 2 from Bucharest Romania with a night of Kickboxing action. Starting off in the heavyweight division, Poland's Dominik Jedrejczyk takes on Romania's Claudiu Badoi in a David versus Goliath fight. Next up, Stefan Orza and Eduard Gafencu look to give fans a fight of the night. In two heavyweight matchups, Florin Ivanoaie faces Cristian Ristea and Ionut Iancu faces Sebastian Cozmanca.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 354 - Fighters Only 15th Annual World Mixed Martial Arts Awards
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Fighters Only 15th Annual World Mixed Martial Arts Awards hosted by Chael Sonnen and honoring Ken Shamrock. These awards honor exceptional performance in various aspects of MMA including: Upset of the Year, Comback of the Year, Ring card Girl of the Year, Gym of the Year, Female and Male Fighter of the Year, Knockout of the Year and Fight of the Year.

programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 14 part 3 from the Commerce Hotel and Casino in Southern California, for an episode packed with action. In a battle of the Big Island Hawaii, Jake Babian and Kealii Kanekoa step into the cage in the welterweight division while the Somali Sniper Shafii Farah takes on Kester Abad in a flyweight battle.

Starting in the heavyweight division, Remus Bortea is matched up against Vasile Corcodel whose three wins are all by KO. In a Superfight middleweight division bout, Darius Argyo takes on Andrei "The Bonecrusher" Varga in what's expected to be a fast paced bout. programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 428 - Clan Wars 51 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Clan Wars 51 part 1 from Belfast, Ireland. Starting off the night, Jack McCrory squares off against Peter Thompson and in two back to back female fights, Gemma Coghill faces the younger Alexa Pagaduan, while Anneka Bower takes on Lisa Murtagh. Also in this episode Conor McAlister and Kelsey Crossey face off in the catchweight division while Michael Swann and Cian Sweeney take to the cage.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 464 - Up Next Fighting 14 part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 14 part 3 from the Commerce Hotel and Casino in Southern California, for an episode packed with action. Up first, Connor Leste and Jason Jones take to the cage in the welterweight division followed by Eden Ibarra versus Gregor Balkian and Atilla Errett versus Amin Derakhshan. In a battle of the Big Island Hawaii, Jake Babian and Kealii Kanekoa step into the cage in the welterweight division while the Somali Sniper Shafii Farah takes on Kester Abad in a flyweight battle.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 430- Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 1 from the Traian Aena in Râmnicu Vâlcea, Romania for a great night of fights. Up first in the middle weight division Denis Ceausu faces Andrei Varga. In the open weight division with a huge weight differential Rodrigo Mineiro, kickboxing world champion takes on boxer Bogdan Bestea for a boxing versus kickboxing contest. Watch as Alex Leautaund of the Netherlands takes on Romania's Mihai Desrobitu in a cruiserweight boxing bout.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 433 - Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 2 from the Traian Aena in Râmnicu Vâlcea, Romania for a great night of fights. First up, a Superfight in the welterweight division, Bogdan Floristean versus Ionel Balan. In the women's lightweight division Maria Nitescu takes on Andreea Cebuc to determine the Baddest Woman in Romania. Also on this episode in the open division Tibor Varga of Hungary steps into the ring with Romania's Bogdan Nastase in a David versus Goliath duel.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 437 - Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 3 from the Traian Aena in Râmnicu Vâlcea, Romania for a great night of boxing and kickboxing fights. In the welterweight division Vinicius Bereta takes on Valentin Mavrodin in a Brazil versus Romania bout. In the open weight division Tolea Ciumac steps into the ring with Valentin Lambagiu with 100 pounds and over 20 years difference between the two fighters for a David versus Goliath duel. In the main event, Portugal's Iuri Fernandes faces Romania's Bogdan Stoica, with a stunning 58 wins to his name, in the Heavyweight division.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 379 - Bare Knuckle Boxing 36 Part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Bare Knuckle Boxing 36 part 1 from London. Starting us off is a match between Jonny "The Zombie" Lawson and Ryan McCann and in a female bout, with both fighters making their BKB debut is Stephanie Dy versus Danni Lee. Also faceing off are Tyrone Eliffe and Richard Samuels and George Taylor and Andrei Nastac take to the ring to battle it out in a heavyweight bare knuckle match.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 380 - Bare Knuckle Boxing 36 Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Bare Knuckle Boxing 36 part 2 from London. Watch as Kamil Sokolowski and Bri Morrow trade punches in a challenging matchup. Peter Hayes and Adam Grogan face off in the ring and Tony Barratt takes on Ryan Barrett. Also Ionel Levitchi of Romania and George Hillyard from London take to the ring.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 381 - Bare Knuckle Boxing 36 Part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Bare Knuckle Boxing 36 part 3 from London. Dan Gittens and Marcin "Psycho" Kosiak step into the ring while Eryk Majda faces Kevin Greenwood with the British heavyweight title on the line. Romanian Bogdan Suru takes on Welsh Ash Williams and in the main event, two BKB veterans Scott McHugh and Tony Lafferty head to the ring for the World Flywieght Title.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 390 - Muay Thai For Life 8 Part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Muay Thai for Life 8.0 part 1 from Sweden at the Rondo Liseberg Center. Starting off in the lightweight division Filip "El Capitan" Lindgren from Stockholm faces hometown favorite Noak Wollsater in a rematch. In the female division, watch as two time Swedish kickboxing champion Joanna Camacho gets into the ring with Janet Kling, two time Swedish Muay Thai silver medalist while Oscar Lindkvist and Simon Vinterskog from rival gyms take to the ring. Also tonight Peter Wallin, K1 champion, takes on Andreas Hall in the light heavyweight division.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 391 - Muay Thai For Life 8 Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Muay Thai for Life 8.0 part 2 from Sweden at the Rondo Liseberg Center. Starting off this episode in the middleweight division Cedrik Von Heiroth faces opponent Viktor Schiller. In a female bout, Ewin Ates and Lisa Larsson both with no defeats take to the ring and Sam Wingqvist is matched up against Sam Ghoroghi in a lightweight match.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 392 - Muay Thai For Life 8 Part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Muay Thai for Life 8.0 part 3 from Sweden at the Rondo Liseberg Center. Buckle up for a brawl in the super heavyweight division as Swedish Muay Thai champion Mattias Lundkvist takes on Zvonimir Kralj "The Croatian Sensation." Also on this episode Alexander Jansson faces Muay Thai champ Poramin Atsa in a middle weight bout while in the co-main event, Colombia's Nico Sanabria takes on Amir El-Dakkak. In the main event Denmark's Youssef Assouik, multiple World Champion, takes on Anton Sjoqvist, Muay Thai World Champion from Stockholm in the super middleweight division.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 464 - Up Next Fighting 14 part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Up Next Fighting 14 part 3 from the Commerce Hotel and Casino in Southern California, for an episode packed with action. Up first, Connor Leste and Jason Jones take to the cage in the welterweight division followed by Eden Ibarra versus Gregor Balkian and Atilla Errett versus Amin Derakhshan. In a battle of the Big Island Hawaii, Jake Babian and Kealii Kanekoa step into the cage in the welterweight division while the Somali Sniper Shafii Farah takes on Kester Abad in a flyweight battle.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 430- Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 1 from the Traian Aena in Râmnicu Vâlcea, Romania for a great night of fights. Up first in the middle weight division Denis Ceausu faces Andrei Varga. In the open weight division with a huge weight differential Rodrigo Mineiro, kickboxing world champion takes on boxer Bogdan Bestea for a boxing versus kickboxing contest. Watch as Alex Leautaund of the Netherlands takes on Romania's Mihai Desrobitu in a cruiserweight boxing bout.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 433 - Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 2 from the Traian Aena in Râmnicu Vâlcea, Romania for a great night of fights. First up, a Superfight in the welterweight division, Bogdan Floristean versus Ionel Balan. In the women's lightweight division Maria Nitescu takes on Andreea Cebuc to determine the Baddest Woman in Romania. Also on this episode in the open division Tibor Varga of Hungary steps into the ring with Romania's Bogdan Nastase in a David versus Goliath duel.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 437 - Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 3 from the Traian Aena in Râmnicu Vâlcea, Romania for a great night of boxing and kickboxing fights. programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 437 - Dynamite Fighting Show 26 part 3

In the welterweight division Vinicius Bereta takes on Valentin Mavrodin in a Brazil versus Romania bout. In the main event, Portugal's Iuri Fernandes faces Romania's Bogdan Stoica, with a stunning 58 wins to his name, in the Heavyweight division.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 255 - KOK’84 World Series, Vilnius part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents KOK '84 World Series from Vilnius Lithuania part 1. In a battle between Lithuanian fighters, Zygimantas Kidikas making his pro debut goes up against his 2-0 opponent Ovidijus Pocius. Watch as Aleh Moshin (Belarus) faces Samuelis Sorochovas (Lithuania), Osvaladas Fedorovic takes on the less experienced Aurimas Krukauskas in a battle between Lithuanian fighters and Vladislav Shatunskui (Poland) battles against Gustas Dimsa (Lithuania). In addition Polish fighter Hubert Dylewski takes on Lithuanian Jan Naus in a very evenly matched fight.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 256 - KOK’84 World Series, Vilnius Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents KOK '84 World Series from Vilnius Lithuania part 2. In this episode, watch as Ukrainian Volodymyr Hynzhu takes on Lithuanian Raimondas Avlasevicius, Finn Larsen (Ireland) goes up against the more experienced Nauris Lukosiunas (Lithuania) and Oleskil Mykhailo 9-0 (Ukraine) faces Henrikas Viksraitis 43-7(Lithuania). In the main event Lithuanians Zygimantas Ramaska and Vitoldas Jagelo face one another in an MMA Bushido battle with at title on the line.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 257 - Shamrock FC 334
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Shamrock Fighting Championship out of the Ameristar Casino in St. Charles, MO. In this event Austin Miller faces Arvin Mills in the cage, Arnez Ferguson takes on Pat Vega in a kickboxing bout and in a female match, Livvy Pecher takes on Lora Campbell. Also Jason Gavril faces Isaac Dancy and Nico Alcaraz takes on Todd Madden in the middleweight division. In the Co-Main event Devin Anderson takes on Aushton Elleby Midkiff and in the main event Jeremiah Curtright with a 3 fight win streak takes on Zack Davis with a 4 fight win streak.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 258 - UFA Presents the Fighter's Only World MMA Awards XIII
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents the 13th annual Fighter's Only 2021 World MMA Awards from Worre Studios in Las Vegas, hosted by Chael Sonnen. Presentations by Dave Farra, Jessy Jess, Doggface208, Emily Whitmire, Cassie Scherbo, Jay Hieron, Dan Henderson, Kayla Harrison, Mackenzie Dern, and more.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 259 - KOK 94 Tallinn Part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 94 World Series from Tallinn, Estonia part 1. Young Estonian fighters Stanislav Teniugin and Siim Viljus battle under KOK Kickboxing rules. Aleh Moshin from Belarus takes on Karl Margus Haud out of Estonia and Edvinas Bubelis (Lithuania) faces Sergei Strinza (Estonia). Also, powerhouse Volodymyr Hynzju from Ukraine takes on Aleksey Larin from Estonia.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 260 - KOK 94 Tallinn Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 94 World Series from Tallinn, Estonia part 2. Watch as the first ever KOK women's bantamweight world championship title is on the line. In some intense all-female matchups each fighter is vying to move on to the finals for a chance at the title. In the semi-finals Estonians Sigrid Kapanen and Astrid Johanna Grents fight to move on and Italian Ludovica Ciarpaglini faces Polish Ilona Woijda to see who will move on to the Grand Prix final match and have a chance at the title.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 261 - KOK 94 Tallinn Part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 94 World Series from Tallinn, Estonia part 3. Watch as Canadian Mohammed Shushan faces Jevgeni "Zora XXL" Ravlusevits of Estonia and Dzmitry Varats (Belarus) takes on Ott Remmer (Estonia).

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 262 - Shamrock FC 335
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Shamrock 335 from Ameristar Casino St Charles. Watch as Pat Gordon takes on Adam Stone, Stanton Ketcherside faces Jerry Ing, Matt Tinker battles it out against James Yarbrough, Kevin Mueller faces Trevon Crawford and Tavae Lewis faces Josh Weston In the co-main event in a kickboxing bout, Ian Zarvos faces Cody Naucke and in the main event Josh Augustin returns to the cage after a long layoff to take on blackbelt Thomas Thatcher.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 263 - SFT 30 - Predador vs Manchinha
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents SFT 30 from Brazil. Denis Araujo with 6 KO's meets Jose Reborn Alexandre in the cage for a fierce MMA bout. In a compelling matchup, Paulo Pizzo takes on the much younger Fernando "ben 10" Lourenco and in the lightweight division #1 ranked Felipe Buakaw takes on #2 Marcio Velaminho. In the main event Wellington Predador faces Thiago Manchinha in an exciting matchup.

programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents SFT 30 from Brazil. Denis Araujo with 6 KO's meets Jose Reborn Alexandre in the cage for a fierce MMA bout. programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 255 - KOK’84 World Series, Vilnius part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents KOK '84 World Series from Vilnius Lithuania part 1. In a battle between Lithuanian fighters, Zygimantas Kidikas making his pro debut goes up against his 2-0 opponent Ovidijus Pocius. Watch as Aleh Moshin (Belarus) faces Samuelis Sorochovas (Lithuania), Osvaladas Fedorovic takes on the less experienced Aurimas Krukauskas in a battle between Lithuanian fighters and Vladislav Shatunskui (Poland) battles against Gustas Dimsa (Lithuania). programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 256 - KOK’84 World Series, Vilnius Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents KOK '84 World Series from Vilnius Lithuania part 2. In this episode, watch as Ukrainian Volodymyr Hynzhu takes on Lithuanian Raimondas Avlasevicius, Finn Larsen (Ireland) goes up against the more experienced Nauris Lukosiunas (Lithuania) and Oleskil Mykhailo 9-0 (Ukraine) faces Henrikas Viksraitis 43-7(Lithuania). In this event Austin Miller faces Arvin Mills in the cage, Arnez Ferguson takes on Pat Vega in a kickboxing bout and in a female match, Livvy Pecher takes on Lora Campbell. Also Jason Gavril faces Isaac Dancy and Nico Alcaraz takes on Todd Madden in the middleweight division. In the Co-Main event Devin Anderson takes on Aushton Elleby Midkiff and in the main event Jeremiah Curtright with a 3 fight win streak takes on Zack Davis with a 4 fight win streak.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 258 - UFA Presents the Fighter's Only World MMA Awards XIII
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents the 13th annual Fighter's Only 2021 World MMA Awards from Worre Studios in Las Vegas, hosted by Chael Sonnen. Presentations by Dave Farra, Jessy Jess, Doggface208, Emily Whitmire, Cassie Scherbo, Jay Hieron, Dan Henderson, Kayla Harrison, Mackenzie Dern, and more.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 259 - KOK 94 Tallinn Part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 94 World Series from Tallinn, Estonia part 1. Young Estonian fighters Stanislav Teniugin and Siim Viljus battle under KOK Kickboxing rules. Aleh Moshin from Belarus takes on Karl Margus Haud out of Estonia and Edvinas Bubelis (Lithuania) faces Sergei Strinza (Estonia). Also, powerhouse Volodymyr Hynzju from Ukraine takes on Aleksey Larin from Estonia.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 260 - KOK 94 Tallinn Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 94 World Series from Tallinn, Estonia part 2. Watch as the first ever KOK women's bantamweight world championship title is on the line. In some intense all-female matchups each fighter is vying to move on to the finals for a chance at the title. In the semi-finals Estonians Sigrid Kapanen and Astrid Johanna Grents fight to move on and Italian Ludovica Ciarpaglini faces Polish Ilona Woijda to see who will move on to the Grand Prix final match and have a chance at the title.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 261 - KOK 94 Tallinn Part 3
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 94 World Series from Tallinn, Estonia part 3. Watch as Canadian Mohammed Shushan faces Jevgeni "Zora XXL" Ravlusevits of Estonia and Dzmitry Varats (Belarus) takes on Ott Remmer (Estonia).

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 262 - Shamrock FC 335
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Shamrock 335 from Ameristar Casino St Charles. Watch as Pat Gordon takes on Adam Stone, Stanton Ketcherside faces Jerry Ing, Matt Tinker battles it out against James Yarbrough, Kevin Mueller faces Trevon Crawford and Tavae Lewis faces Josh Weston In the co-main event in a kickboxing bout, Ian Zarvos faces Cody Naucke and in the main event Josh Augustin returns to the cage after a long layoff to take on blackbelt Thomas Thatcher.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 263 - SFT 30 - Predador vs Manchinha
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents SFT 30 from Brazil. Denis Araujo with 6 KO's meets Jose Reborn Alexandre in the cage for a fierce MMA bout. In a compelling matchup, Paulo Pizzo takes on the much younger Fernando "ben 10" Lourenco and in the lightweight division #1 ranked Felipe Buakaw takes on #2 Marcio Velaminho. In the main event Wellington Predador faces Thiago Manchinha in an exciting matchup.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 255 - KOK’84 World Series, Vilnius part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents KOK '84 World Series from Vilnius Lithuania part 1. In a battle between Lithuanian fighters, Zygimantas Kidikas making his pro debut goes up against his 2-0 opponent Ovidijus Pocius. Watch as Aleh Moshin (Belarus) faces Samuelis Sorochovas (Lithuania), Osvaladas Fedorovic takes on the less experienced Aurimas Krukauskas in a battle between Lithuanian fighters and Vladislav Shatunskui (Poland) battles against Gustas Dimsa (Lithuania). In addition Polish fighter Hubert Dylewski takes on Lithuanian Jan Naus in a very evenly matched fight.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 256 - KOK’84 World Series, Vilnius Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents KOK '84 World Series from Vilnius Lithuania part 2. In this episode, watch as Ukrainian Volodymyr Hynzhu takes on Lithuanian Raimondas Avlasevicius, Finn Larsen (Ireland) goes up against the more experienced Nauris Lukosiunas (Lithuania) and Oleskil Mykhailo 9-0 (Ukraine) faces Henrikas Viksraitis 43-7(Lithuania). In the main event Lithuanians Zygimantas Ramaska and Vitoldas Jagelo face one another in an MMA Bushido battle with at title on the line.

programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 94 World Series from Tallinn, Estonia part 3. Watch as Canadian Mohammed Shushan faces Jevgeni "Zora XXL" Ravlusevits of Estonia and Dzmitry Varats (Belarus) takes on Ott Remmer (Estonia).

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 262 - Shamrock FC 335
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Shamrock 335 from Ameristar Casino St Charles. Watch as Pat Gordon takes on Adam Stone, Stanton Ketcherside faces Jerry Ing, Matt Tinker battles it out against James Yarbrough, Kevin Mueller faces Trevon Crawford and Tavae Lewis faces Josh Weston In the co-main event in a kickboxing bout, Ian Zarvos faces Cody Naucke and in the main event Josh Augustin returns to the cage after a long layoff to take on blackbelt Thomas Thatcher.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 263 - SFT 30 - Predador vs Manchinha
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents SFT 30 from Brazil. Denis Araujo with 6 KO's meets Jose Reborn Alexandre in the cage for a fierce MMA bout. In a compelling matchup, Paulo Pizzo takes on the much younger Fernando "ben 10" Lourenco and in the lightweight division #1 ranked Felipe Buakaw takes on #2 Marcio Velaminho. In the main event Wellington Predador faces Thiago Manchinha in an exciting matchup.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 257 - Shamrock FC 334
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Shamrock Fighting Championship out of the Ameristar Casino in St. Charles, MO. In this event Austin Miller faces Arvin Mills in the cage, Arnez Ferguson takes on Pat Vega in a kickboxing bout and in a female match, Livvy Pecher takes on Lora Campbell. Also Jason Gavril faces Isaac Dancy and Nico Alcaraz takes on Todd Madden in the middleweight division. In the Co-Main event Devin Anderson takes on Aushton Elleby Midkiff and in the main event Jeremiah Curtright with a 3 fight win streak takes on Zack Davis with a 4 fight win streak.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 259 - KOK 94 Tallinn Part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 94 World Series from Tallinn, Estonia part 1. Young Estonian fighters Stanislav Teniugin and Siim Viljus battle under KOK Kickboxing rules. Aleh Moshin from Belarus takes on Karl Margus Haud out of Estonia and Edvinas Bubelis (Lithuania) faces Sergei Strinza (Estonia). Also, powerhouse Volodymyr Hynzju from Ukraine takes on Aleksey Larin from Estonia.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 260 - KOK 94 Tallinn Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents King of Kings 94 World Series from Tallinn, Estonia part 2. Watch as the first ever KOK women's bantamweight world championship title is on the line. In some intense all-female matchups each fighter is vying to move on to the finals for a chance at the title. In the semi-finals Estonians Sigrid Kapanen and Astrid Johanna Grents fight to move on and Italian Ludovica Ciarpaglini faces Polish Ilona Woijda to see who will move on to the Grand Prix final match and have a chance at the title.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 255 - KOK’84 World Series, Vilnius part 1
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents KOK '84 World Series from Vilnius Lithuania part 1. In a battle between Lithuanian fighters, Zygimantas Kidikas making his pro debut goes up against his 2-0 opponent Ovidijus Pocius. Watch as Aleh Moshin (Belarus) faces Samuelis Sorochovas (Lithuania), Osvaladas Fedorovic takes on the less experienced Aurimas Krukauskas in a battle between Lithuanian fighters and Vladislav Shatunskui (Poland) battles against Gustas Dimsa (Lithuania). In addition Polish fighter Hubert Dylewski takes on Lithuanian Jan Naus in a very evenly matched fight.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance - UFA 256 - KOK’84 World Series, Vilnius Part 2
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents KOK '84 World Series from Vilnius Lithuania part 2. In this episode, watch as Ukrainian Volodymyr Hynzhu takes on Lithuanian Raimondas Avlasevicius, Finn Larsen (Ireland) goes up against the more experienced Nauris Lukosiunas (Lithuania) and Oleskil Mykhailo 9-0 (Ukraine) faces Henrikas Viksraitis 43-7(Lithuania). In the main event Lithuanians Zygimantas Ramaska and Vitoldas Jagelo face one another in an MMA Bushido battle with at title on the line.

programme.title: KARATE COMBAT: INCEPTION
programme.desc: Live from Miami Beach on April 26, 2018, Karate Combat: Inception is the first event of the Karate Combat fighting league's inaugural season. Held as a private, invite-only spectacle, this video stream will show all of the key fighters, as it happens. Featured on the Main Card: Elhadji "Black Magic" Ndour of the United States versus Andras “The Titan” Virag, a game contender from Hungary. The co-main event features Dionicio Gustavo of the Dominican Republic versus France's Alexandre Bouderbane in a key contest. Other fighters include Adham Sabry of the USA, Spyros Margaritopoulos of Greece, and Joshua Quayhagen from the USA.

programme.title: KARATE COMBAT: INCEPTION
programme.desc: Live from Miami Beach on April 26, 2018, Karate Combat: Inception is the first event of the Karate Combat fighting league's inaugural season. Held as a private, invite-only spectacle, this video stream will show all of the key fighters, as it happens. Featured on the Main Card: Elhadji "Black Magic" Ndour of the United States versus Andras “The Titan” Virag, a game contender from Hungary. The co-main event features Dionicio Gustavo of the Dominican Republic versus France's Alexandre Bouderbane in a key contest. Other fighters include Adham Sabry of the USA, Spyros Margaritopoulos of Greece, and Joshua Quayhagen from the USA.

programme.title: American Grappling - Seattle
programme.desc: American Grappling heads to Seattle, Washington. Coach Morgan heads to the world-famous Pike’s Market and get a taste of the Northwest. Our featured competitor is the black belt Nathan Orchard. Nathan is looking to make Team USA to tick the final box of his career…win a grappling world championship…but he’ll have to get past Eric Spence. Eric has wrestled his whole life and competed on a wrestling US World team. It’s the traditional clash of styles between wrestling and jiujitsu. Find out who’ll end up on top and secure their spot at the world team trials.

programme.title: Red Bull Hardline 2025 - Australia
programme.desc: Los mejores riders de MTB se enfrentan a un terreno diverso, abrupto y escarpado en la carrera de descenso del Maydena Bike Park de Tasmania donde sólo se puede asistir por invitación.

programme.title: Padel Life – Conociendo a las estrellas del juego
programme.desc: Cuatro figuras del pádel —Arturo Coello, Ariana Sánchez, Fede Chingotto y Ale Salazar— comparten sus viajes, sacrificios y la pasión que impulsa su éxito dentro y fuera de la pista.

programme.title: Pushing Progression - Freeride mountain biking
programme.desc: Red Bull Rampage y Formation impulsan la progresión del MTB freeride con figuras como Kyle Strait, Cam McCaul, Jaxson Riddle y Hannah Bergemann, junto a la esquiadora Lindsey Vonn como invitada.

programme.title: Pushing Progression - kitesurf
programme.desc: La evolución del kiteboarding contada por atletas como Robby Naish y su impulso gracias a eventos clave como Red Bull King of the Air y Red Bull Megaloop.

programme.title: Pushing Progression - La Evolución del Hard Enduro
programme.desc: Fabio Wibmer se une a Manuel Lettenbichler, Billy Bolt, Laia Sanz y Paul Bolton para repasar décadas de evolución en el Hard Enduro a través del legendario Red Bull Erzbergrodeo.

programme.title: Pushing Progression: Clavados de Altura
programme.desc: La Serie Mundial Red Bull Cliff Diving impulsa la progresión del clavado de altura. Conoce a Orlando Duque, Gary Hunt, Molly Carlson y Rhiannan Iffland mientras comparten su visión del deporte.

programme.title: Pushing Progression - Freestyle football
programme.desc: Descubre cómo tres atletas de distintos rincones del mundo usan el freestyle para romper barreras y cómo esta escena se convirtió en un movimiento global gracias a Red Bull Street Style.

programme.title: Pushing Progression Breaking
programme.desc: La evolución del breaking se explora a través de Busta Rhymes y bailarines de distintas generaciones, desde los patios traseros del Bronx hasta escenarios globales como el Red Bull BC One.

programme.title: For Reals - Aviones de papel y zambullidas entre ruinas
programme.desc: Un vistazo a las disciplinas más inusuales y desafiantes que enfrentan los atletas de Red Bull, desde clavados en ruinas antiguas hasta duelos en competiciones de aviones de papel.

programme.title: For Reals - Saltando en skate desde un avión
programme.desc: Los atletas de Red Bull lo hacen todo, desde freerunning en un aeropuerto hasta saltar en patineta desde un avión en pleno vuelo.

programme.title: For Reals - Wingsuit volando la Tower Bridge
programme.desc: Los atletas de Red Bull enfrentan retos extremos, desde caminar en slackline sobre la distancia de dos campos de fútbol hasta realizar saltos BASE dentro de una cueva.

programme.title: For Reals
programme.desc: Los atletas de Red Bull lo hacen todo, desde esquiar de noche en las pendientes más empinadas hasta practicar slacklining durante un eclipse.

programme.title: For Reals - paracaidismo con una moto FMX
programme.desc: Los atletas de Red Bull hacen de todo, desde saltar en moto desde el cielo hasta derrapar en hielo con autos de rally.

programme.title: Premier Padel 2025 Santiago P1 Highlights
programme.desc: Los mejores jugadores de pádel del mundo se enfrentan en el Santiago Premier Padel P1 en Santiago de Chile.

programme.title: Premier Padel 2025 Qatar Major Highlights
programme.desc: Los mejores jugadores de pádel del mundo se enfrentan en el Qatar Major Premier Padel en Doha.

programme.title: El ABC de MotoGP
programme.desc: Guía esencial sobre MotoGP™, la categoría más alta del motociclismo, con información clave sobre reglas, términos y estructura del deporte.

programme.title: For Reals
programme.desc: Los atletas de Red Bull lo hacen todo, desde montar BMX en un skatepark bajo un globo aerostático hasta wakeskating desde un rascacielos en Dubái.

programme.title: For Reals

Fish: the Surfboard Documentary, covers the impact the fish surfboard made on surf culture. A deep look at the origin and impact of the Fish Surfboard design and how it would influence surf culture 30 years later.
A look at what happens when a creative San Diego surfer invents a board with a brand-new shape, and the whole surfing world hops aboard for the ride. THE FISH SURFBOARD DESIGN was created by Steve Lis in the San Diego Cliffs area in 1967, and became HUGELY popular in the 1990's.

programme.desc: Kai Lenny fields a team for Pipeline’s Backdoor Shootout, then tackles The Eddie at Waimea.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Mid-season, Kai Lenny heads to Alaska for surf and heli-snow sessions with Travis Rice.

programme.title: Paradigm Lost
programme.desc: Inside Kai Lenny’s life: from kiteboarding to big waves, he’s mastered every water sport.

programme.title: Jay Phillips Isn't Dead
programme.desc: The artistic and cinematic tale of Jay Phillips, one of Australia's greatest surfing talents.

programme.title: The Curious Tales of Italo Ferreira
programme.desc: He was the world's first Olympic surfing gold medalist. Can the Brazilian surfing sensation Ítalo Ferreira now wrap up the World Surf League Championship Tour title for the second successive time?

programme.title: Let's Be Frank
programme.desc: Is Frank Solomon a kind-hearted surfer or a hard-living bad boy? The man and myth may be inseparable.

programme.title: Bustin' Down The Door
programme.desc: This documentary explores how a group of surfers revolutionized surfing in 1975.

programme.title: Isolated
programme.desc: Five world class surfers travel to New Guinea in search of undiscovered waves, but end up discovering so much more.

programme.title: And Two If By Sea
programme.desc: The story of iconic professional surfers and identical twins CJ & Damien Hobgood. Their sibling rivalry and struggle to each establish their own identity fueled their careers, but ripped their personal and peripheral relationships apart.

programme.title: Ghost Babe
programme.desc: Taylor and his surfer buddies think they have struck gold when he inherits a mansion by the beach.

programme.title: Morning of the Earth
programme.desc: The film portrays surfers living in spiritual harmony with nature, making their own boards (and homes) as they traveled in search of the perfect wave across Australia's north-east coast, Bali and Hawaii.

programme.title: S1E2 El Nino
programme.desc: Chris Benchetler continues his epic skiing adventure from California’s Mammoth Mountain and the Sierra Nevada backcountry to the massive slopes of British Columbia. This time, X Games gold medalist Jossi Wells joins him for "The Sierra Trifecta," tackling skiing, climbing, and biking all in a single day. Chris and his crew hike 6,000 vertical feet through rugged rock fields to chase the last snow of the season in the Sierras, pushing their limits and capturing every thrilling moment.

programme.title: S1E1 Lucha
programme.desc: Ian Hodgkinson, known as Vampiro in the world of wrestling, was a famed wrestler in the late 80’s and 90’s. Today, he shifted his career to being behind the scenes as a Story Producer for AAA, the top wrestling company in Lucha Libre. Hodgkinson intimately peels back the curtain on the mysteries of this show, how it’s produced, and what life is like on and off the stage. We dive deep in to the lives of two wrestlers and follow their stories as they prep for their next fight: El Hijo Del Fantasma, an up and coming star who seemingly has it all, as well as Faby Apache, a veteran female wrestler struggling to stay relevant as she raises her son.

programme.title: S1E1 Adventure Series
programme.desc: Join “The Lion Whisperer” Kevin Richardson and a fearless team of conservationists on an epic mission to protect the planet’s most majestic and endangered predators. From rescuing lions at the Kevin Richardson Wildlife Sanctuary in South Africa to safeguarding orangutans and Cape Griffons in the wilds of Indonesia, witness heart-pounding rescues, fierce battles against exploitation, and inspiring stories of survival. This is conservation at its most daring—unmissable, unforgettable, and truly wild.

programme.title: S1E2 Adventure Series
programme.desc: Join “The Lion Whisperer” Kevin Richardson and a fearless team of conservationists on an epic mission to protect the planet’s most majestic and endangered predators. From rescuing lions at the Kevin Richardson Wildlife Sanctuary in South Africa to safeguarding orangutans and Cape Griffons in the wilds of Indonesia, witness heart-pounding rescues, fierce battles against exploitation, and inspiring stories of survival. This is conservation at its most daring—unmissable, unforgettable, and truly wild.

programme.title: S2E1 Adventure Series
programme.desc: From polar bears to roaring lions—this is GoPro Adventures at its wildest. Dive into jaw-dropping encounters with lions, whales, turtles, giraffes, and watch “The Lion Whisperer” Kevin Richardson at his South African sanctuary, where rescued predators find a second chance. It’s the ultimate fusion of wildlife wonder and high-octane thrills—you won’t be able to look away.

programme.title: S2E2 Adventure Series
programme.desc: Motorbikes, speed, and pure adrenaline—this is the ultimate GoPro adventure. Ride with Mexican enduro master Didier Goirand, push limits alongside British racing icon Maria Costello, the only female motorcycle racer ever to be awarded an MBE, and feel the thrill with American motorsports legend and DC Shoes founder Ken Block. High-octane action, world-class talent, and breathtaking moments—you won’t want to miss a second.

programme.title: S1E1 El Nino
programme.desc: Chasing El Niño follows Chris Benchetler on an epic skiing adventure from California’s Mammoth Mountain and the Sierra Nevada backcountry to the vast slopes of British Columbia. Joined by longtime friends Bryan Fox, Scotty Smith, and Canadian pro skier Nick McNutt, Chris explores previously inaccessible terrain, searches for perfect powder, and faces challenging weather conditions. Along the way, the crew embraces the joy of skiing, building creative jumps at their campsite and making the most of every moment on the mountain. This episode captures the thrill of exploration, friendship, and the relentless pursuit of epic lines.

programme.title: S1E1 Draft Story
programme.desc: In Part 1, we uncover the story of Tyvis Powell and the people who shaped him into the man and football player he is today. His road to the NFL was anything but easy, and it nearly never happened without the guidance of his mentor, Sean Williams. A Draft Story is a GoPro Original Production that follows Ohio State safety Tyvis Powell as he makes the leap to professional football. Though he was not invited to Chicago for the 2016 NFL Draft, his journey is unforgettable. Witness the tension, hope, and emotion as Tyvis waits for the call that will change his life and etch the Powell name into NFL history. This is his Draft Story.

programme.title: S1 E2 Draft Story
programme.desc: A Draft Story” Part 2 is a GoPro Original Production that follows Ohio State safety Tyvis Powell as he takes the leap into professional football. Facing unexpected challenges, honoring a promise to local kids, and navigating a situation he never imagined, Tyvis proves that the journey to the NFL is full of twists, heart, and determination.

programme.title: S1E1 Driven
programme.desc:
GoPro Motorsports Original Series DRIVEN takes you deep inside the world of Supercross and Motocross champion James Stewart. Ride alongside the man known as the fastest on two wheels as he shares the highs, lows, and relentless drive that shaped his legendary career.
GoPro Original Series DRIVEN also follows X Games star and snowmobile icon Chris Burandt. Join him on a thrilling journey to discover what fuels his passion and dedication to the lifestyle he has loved since childhood. This is raw, high-octane storytelling you can’t miss.

programme.title: S1E1 Two Roads
programme.desc:
“Two Roads” is an original GoPro series that follows nine athletes and one coach who have committed themselves to the relentless pursuit of greatness. Each episode dives deep into an athlete’s unique journey, revealing the life-changing moments that shaped the path they walk today.
This episode features Olympic bronze medalist Kristian Ipsen, American rugby union star Carlin Isles — celebrated as “The Fastest Man in Rugby” — and his remarkable rise from track and field and American football to becoming a two-time Olympian in rugby sevens. You’ll also meet Allison Stokke, a record-breaking high school pole vaulter who went on to compete at UC Berkeley, and Miles Chamley-Watson, a British-American fencing champion whose career includes 13 team Pan American titles, a 2019 team world championship, a 2013 individual world championship, three Olympic appearances, and a 2016 team Olympic bronze medal.

programme.title: S1E1 Moto
programme.desc: Two brothers. Two motorcycles. Ride along with GoPro Family members Carlos and Alex Costa on the adventure of a lifetime as they explore the vibrant cities and stunning beaches of Morocco. Plus, enjoy exclusive bonus footage featuring the very best of GoPro Motorsports.

programme.title: S1E2 Moto
programme.desc: The journey continues as we follow two brothers on their 2,300-kilometer adventure across Morocco. Two brothers. Two motorcycles. Ride along with GoPro Family members Carlos and Alex Costa as they experience vibrant cities, breathtaking beaches, and the adventure of a lifetime. Plus, enjoy bonus footage of Jeremy Seewer. With 50 podiums, 11 victories, 17 race wins, and five FIM Motocross World Championship silver medals, his record is remarkable — yet his story goes far beyond the numbers.

programme.title: S2E1 Moto
programme.desc: Celebrate the women of GoPro, including British rally driver Catie Munnings, who rose to fame after winning the FIA European Rally Championship Ladies Trophy at just 18. Watch snowboarder Alina Hight who made history as the first to land a double backside alley-oop rodeo in a halfpipe competition. Meet Teigan Nash, co-founder of Girls Who Glow, inspiring young women everywhere. Plus, experience even more of the very best from GoPro Motorsports.

programme.title: S3E1 Moto
programme.desc: GoPro Athlete and Formula 1 star Daniel Ricciardo teams up with Race Service Co-Founder James Kirkham for an unforgettable ride through Los Angeles. With eight Grand Prix victories and 32 podiums to his name, the Honey Badger spends his day off behind the wheel of supercars like the Ford GT, racing past Beverly Hills, the Sunset Strip, and into the winding roads of Benedict Canyon. Plus, enjoy even more of the very best from GoPro Motorsports.

programme.title: S3E1 Adventure Series
programme.desc: The GoPro production crew journeys to the Marum Crater on Ambrym Island in Vanuatu to join adventurer photographers Geoff Mackley and Bradley Ambrose, the first people to stand at the edge of a boiling lava lake and witness the raw lifeblood of our planet. The adventure continues with Dr. Ingrid Visser, who has dedicated her life and research to protecting the most intelligent predator in the ocean, the orca. She swims alongside wild orcas and champions modern solutions to free them from captivity. Experience never-before-seen footage captured by a GoPro mounted to the dorsal fin of a wild orca, along with rare archival material from the Orca Research Trust. This is exploration and conservation at its most powerful.

programme.title: S3E2 Adventure Series
programme.desc: The journey continues with Dr. Ingrid Visser, a marine pioneer devoted to protecting the ocean’s most intelligent predator, the orca. She swims with wild orcas and leads the charge for innovative solutions to end captivity. Witness never-before-seen footage captured by a GoPro mounted to the dorsal fin of a wild orca, paired with rare archival material from the Orca Research Trust. This is exploration and conservation at their most inspiring. In the wide-open skies and sweeping valleys of the Mustang Monument Wild Horse Eco-Resort & Sanctuary, more than 600 Wild American Mustangs roam free. Cowboy and family man Clay Nannini reveals the importance of preserving this symbol of American heritage while passing its legacy to his children. As night falls, Tokyo becomes an electrifying playground for those who crave speed and style. The city’s custom vehicle culture bursts to life, introducing unforgettable characters and rides unlike anything you have seen before. Lamborghinis, Hayabusas, RWB Porsches, and Kaido Racers create a visual feast on the streets of Tokyo after dark.

programme.title: S3E3 Adventure Series
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of four incredible adventures and discover how they came to life. At the Mustang Monument Wild Horse Eco-Resort & Sanctuary, over 600 Wild American Mustangs roam the sweeping valleys and open skies. Cowboy and family man Clay Nannini shares the passion and dedication it takes to preserve this living symbol of American heritage. In Tokyo, the crew captures the city’s transformation after dark into a high-octane playground where custom car culture thrives. From Lamborghinis to RWB Porsches, Hayabusas to Kaido Racers, every frame is a visual thrill. In the icy waters of Greenland’s Disko Bay, the team follows professional ice climbers Klemen Premrl and Aljaz Anderle as they take on a fragile and unpredictable iceberg, facing nature’s challenges and learning powerful lessons along the way. The journey closes with Dr. Ingrid Visser’s mission to protect the orca. Viewers are treated to never-before-seen footage from a GoPro mounted to a wild orca’s dorsal fin along with rare archival material from the Orca Research Trust. This is an unmissable look at the grit, passion, and artistry behind creating these extraordinary stories.

programme.title: S3E4 Adventure Series
programme.desc: Go further behind the scenes as the crew captures Tokyo’s transformation after dark into a high-octane playground where custom car culture reigns supreme. They search for the elusive Shinichi Moroboshi, a legendary figure in Japan’s supercar scene and well-known Lamborghini enthusiast. The adventure continues in the snow with GoPro athletes John Jackson and Chris Benchetler on a quest for the perfect ride. From the bustling streets of Tokyo to the serene landscapes of Hakuba and the untouched powder fields of Hokkaido, the crew follows every moment of their journey. Along the way, you will see how these breathtaking stories were crafted, from scouting locations to capturing the raw energy and beauty of each scene. This is your all-access pass to the artistry, adrenaline, and dedication that make these adventures unforgettable.

Along the way, the crew embraces the joy of skiing, building creative jumps at their campsite and making the most of every moment on the mountain. This episode captures the thrill of exploration, friendship, and the relentless pursuit of epic lines.

programme.title: S2E2 Bike
programme.desc: GoPro Bike takes you on epic rides around the world. Watch Olympic gold medalist Conor Fields, BMX champion, compete at the highest level, then join GoPro athletes Sam Pilgrim, urban downhill master, Geoff Gulevich, trail expert, and Sam Reynolds, street shredder, as they explore the stunning landscapes and dramatic terrain of Cappadocia, Turkey. Adventure, speed, and skill collide in every breathtaking moment.

programme.title: S2E3 Bike
programme.desc: GoPro Bike takes you to the world’s most extreme mountain biking adventures. Watch Geoff Gulevich, trail master, tackle some of the gnarliest chutes in Williams Lake, BC, dropping in with local legend Cory Brunelle, downhill expert. Then experience some of the best riders from around the globe as they conquer massive mountains, perform jaw-dropping tricks, and push the limits of skill and adrenaline in breathtaking terrain.

programme.title: S3E1 Bike
programme.desc: GoPro Bike takes you on epic, boundary-pushing adventures. Watch GoPro athlete Kilian Bron, trail innovator, team up with big-mountain skier Victor Broquedis, powder champion, in Peru as they summit Cerro Blanco, the world-record 3,860-foot dune, and ride unforgettable downhill mountain bike and ski runs. Then experience some of the best riders from around the globe as they conquer massive mountains, perform jaw-dropping tricks, and push the limits of skill, speed, and adrenaline.

programme.title: S3E2 Bike
programme.desc: GoPro Bike brings you heart-pounding downhill action from the Mountain of Hell in Les Alpes, France. Watch GoPro athlete Antoni Villoni, downhill master, as he navigates crashes, weaves through expert trails, and powers down 7,800 vertical feet of snow-capped peaks, dusty singletracks, and technical terrain. Hundreds of riders take on this epic race, where only speed, skill, and courage decide who reaches the finish line first. The rules are simple: first one to cross the line wins...

programme.title: S1E1 Tour
programme.desc: Pursuing the Tour de France, one of the most physically demanding sporting events in the world, covers over 3,535 kilometers in just three weeks. Every young cyclist dreams of competing in this prestigious race, but only nine riders from each team make the cut. Young cyclist Adam Yates is giving everything he has to prove he belongs on cycling’s biggest stage. 2016 Tour de France winner Chris Froome reflects on the long and grueling journey to victory, while former professional cyclists and Tour de France veterans Jens Voigt, Christian Vande Velde, and Haimar Zubeldia reveal what it truly takes to compete at the highest level.

programme.title: S1E2 Tour
programme.desc: Pursuing the Tour de France, one of the most physically demanding sporting events in the world, covers over 3,535 kilometers in just three weeks. Every young cyclist dreams of competing in this prestigious race, but only nine riders from each team make the cut. programme.title: S1E1 Animals
programme.desc: GoPro Animals delivers heartwarming, hilarious, and jaw-dropping moments from the animal world. From Golden Retrievers, French Bulldogs, and Border Collies bringing endless puppy smiles, to rescuing orcas and swimming with humpback whales, this show has it all. Wildlife photographer Chris Barnard captures the wild up close, even surviving a giraffe’s mighty kick. Plus, join Ocean Conservation Namibia as they race to save seals trapped in deadly ocean debris. A must-watch for every animal lover.

programme.title: S1E1 Lucha
programme.desc: Ian Hodgkinson, known as Vampiro in the world of wrestling, was a famed wrestler in the late 80’s and 90’s. Today, he shifted his career to being behind the scenes as a Story Producer for AAA, the top wrestling company in Lucha Libre. Hodgkinson intimately peels back the curtain on the mysteries of this show, how it’s produced, and what life is like on and off the stage. We dive deep in to the lives of two wrestlers and follow their stories as they prep for their next fight: El Hijo Del Fantasma, an up and coming star who seemingly has it all, as well as Faby Apache, a veteran female wrestler struggling to stay relevant as she raises her son.
