programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 193
programme.desc: This episode covers Italian design and high performance, featuring the stylish Ranieri Sauvage 34 luxury RIB and the premier charter offerings of Spartivento. This is contrasted with the high-speed thrill of the Cigarette 41 Nighthawk SD, a performance center console with a new stepped-deck design.

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 194
programme.desc: This episode features the sleek De Antonio D60, a 60-foot Spanish yacht renowned for its clean deck and hidden outboards, alongside a look at the innovative Euthalia lightning protection system. Finally, it highlights the powerful, recently updated Robalo R300 CC (PBIBS 2025), a 30-foot center console built for serious offshore fishing with an aggressive Deep-V hull.

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 195
programme.desc: This episode features the luxury and speed of the Celebration for the 40th anniversary of Pershing in Capri, alongside the superyacht prowess of Heesen Yachts' Agnetha, a 55-meter yacht with a 4,500 NM range. It concludes with the rugged, unsinkable performance of the Everglades 315 CC (PBIBS 2025), a premium offshore center console.

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 196
programme.desc: This segment showcases three impressive boats: the Ranieri International Cayman 50, a 50-foot luxury maxi-RIB capable of 55 knots; the Italian icon Riva 58 Capri, a new sport-open yacht blending high-speed performance and classic elegance; and the Bayliner V36 (PBIBS 2025), a versatile express cruiser known for maximizing family cruising space.

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 189
programme.desc: The segment features the Best of Motor Boats at Genoa Boat Show 2025, highlighting top Italian and global innovations. This is contrasted with the high-capacity, versatile Hurricane 3200 Sundeck (MIBS 2025), and the luxurious downeast-style Back Cove 39O (MIBS 2025)

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 190
programme.desc: This segment offers a dramatic contrast, featuring the international excellence and new launches from the Best of Sailing Boats at Genoa Boat Show 2025 alongside two high-performance American powerboats at MIBS: the massive, quint-engine HCB 56 Sueños GIX, a center console yacht with 3,000 HP and luxury amenities, and the versatile Pursuit S328 Sport, which perfectly balances serious offshore fishing with premium family cruising and comfort.

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 191
programme.desc: The segment features three diverse luxury vessels: the long-range comfort of the Absolute Navetta 62 trawler yacht; the high-speed performance of the Mystic M4200 (PBIBS 2025) center console with raceboat heritage; and the elegant Sirena 48 Coupe (PBIBS 2025), an owner-operated yacht known for its efficient hull and open design.

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 192
programme.desc: This episode is dedicated to performance and versatility, highlighting the 50-knot Italian maxi-RIB Mar.co E44 with its luxury cabin. It also covers three premier US fishing boats: the wide-beamed Southport 38 FE (PBIBS 2025), the serious offshore Bertram 39 CC (PBIBS 2025), and the versatile hybrid bay boat Blackfin 262 HB (MIBS 2025).

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 193

It concludes with the rugged, unsinkable performance of the Everglades 315 CC (PBIBS 2025), a premium offshore center console.

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 196
programme.desc: This segment showcases three impressive boats: the Ranieri International Cayman 50, a 50-foot luxury maxi-RIB capable of 55 knots; the Italian icon Riva 58 Capri, a new sport-open yacht blending high-speed performance and classic elegance; and the Bayliner V36 (PBIBS 2025), a versatile express cruiser known for maximizing family cruising space.

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 189
programme.desc: The segment features the Best of Motor Boats at Genoa Boat Show 2025, highlighting top Italian and global innovations. This is contrasted with the high-capacity, versatile Hurricane 3200 Sundeck (MIBS 2025), and the luxurious downeast-style Back Cove 39O (MIBS 2025)

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 190
programme.desc: This segment offers a dramatic contrast, featuring the international excellence and new launches from the Best of Sailing Boats at Genoa Boat Show 2025 alongside two high-performance American powerboats at MIBS: the massive, quint-engine HCB 56 Sueños GIX, a center console yacht with 3,000 HP and luxury amenities, and the versatile Pursuit S328 Sport, which perfectly balances serious offshore fishing with premium family cruising and comfort.

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 191
programme.desc: The segment features three diverse luxury vessels: the long-range comfort of the Absolute Navetta 62 trawler yacht; the high-speed performance of the Mystic M4200 (PBIBS 2025) center console with raceboat heritage; and the elegant Sirena 48 Coupe (PBIBS 2025), an owner-operated yacht known for its efficient hull and open design.

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 192
programme.desc: This episode is dedicated to performance and versatility, highlighting the 50-knot Italian maxi-RIB Mar.co E44 with its luxury cabin. It also covers three premier US fishing boats: the wide-beamed Southport 38 FE (PBIBS 2025), the serious offshore Bertram 39 CC (PBIBS 2025), and the versatile hybrid bay boat Blackfin 262 HB (MIBS 2025).

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 193
programme.desc: This episode covers Italian design and high performance, featuring the stylish Ranieri Sauvage 34 luxury RIB and the premier charter offerings of Spartivento. This is contrasted with the high-speed thrill of the Cigarette 41 Nighthawk SD, a performance center console with a new stepped-deck design.

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 194
programme.desc: This episode features the sleek De Antonio D60, a 60-foot Spanish yacht renowned for its clean deck and hidden outboards, alongside a look at the innovative Euthalia lightning protection system. Finally, it highlights the powerful, recently updated Robalo R300 CC (PBIBS 2025), a 30-foot center console built for serious offshore fishing with an aggressive Deep-V hull.

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 1
programme.desc: Explore with us the beautiful Cala del Forte Marina, right beside Monaco, the let's discover together the shipyard of Silent Yachts, and the Elan i43

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 2
programme.desc: Maurizio Bulleri takes us on board the Invictus TT420. Then let's sail together on the Swan 55 Alegher

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 3
programme.desc: Performance, speed, power and style with OTAM 58 GTS and Sunseeker Predator 65

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 4
programme.desc: Bill Hackett shows us the Extra Yachts X96, while Bacci Del Buono enjoys a ride with the MarCo R-Evolution 26. Pardo E60 closes this episode of The Boat Show

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 5
programme.desc: Are you ready for speed, choppy waters and sportiness? Jump on board the Ribco Venom 44. A nice marine touch on the Riviera 78 Motoryacht, innovation on the Arksen 30

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 6
programme.desc: Some tech talk with Simrad before discovering together how an MJM boat is made! Then let's jump on board Sunseeker Superhawk 55

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 7
programme.desc: From the amazing speed of the Phenom 37 to the calm luxury of the Prestige M8. Then let's take a look at the Jupiter 40

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 8
programme.desc: How about visiting Venice with a little wooden boat powered by Yanmar? Then we fly to Miami for an overview of the Brunswick brands and a quick look at the Cranchi A46

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 9
programme.desc: Let’s sail together on the beautiful sea of Sardinia. 500 Offshore: is that a boat or a car?

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 10
programme.desc: A traditional boat with a new touch: Apreamare Gozzo 35 Speedster. Maria Elisa Altese introduces us to the world of Denison Yachting. Amazing regattas at the Ice Cup

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 11
programme.desc: With Bill Hackett on board Phenom 34, on the water of Naples with the Salpa Soleil 24.5 and then in Dusseldorf for the Sunbeam 32.1

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 12
programme.desc: On the rollercoaster with The Boat Show! Let’s start slowly in Venice with Venmar Lido 32, at full speed with Valhalla 55 and slowly again with Jeanneau

programme.desc: With Bill Hackett on board Phenom 34, on the water of Naples with the Salpa Soleil 24.5 and then in Dusseldorf for the Sunbeam 32.1

programme.title: The Boat Show – Episode 12
programme.desc: On the rollercoaster with The Boat Show! Let’s start slowly in Venice with Venmar Lido 32, at full speed with Valhalla 55 and slowly again with Jeanneau

programme.title: Boom America
programme.desc: Kevin Harrington and Toli Cefail meet with the team at Advanced Vitality to explore the cutting edge of preventative healthcare. With over 60% of Americans facing accelerated cellular aging, the company is looking to scale fast—and needs the right strategy to do it. Next, Cindy from Scout & Zoe’s joins the conversation to share how her insect-based dog treats are creating buzz in the pet industry. Her clever and down-to-earth grassroots marketing approach (pun intended) is changing the game for alternative protein sources. Finally, Kevin and Toli sit down with leaders from Hammer Haag Steel and Zenith Trek to dive into the challenges and opportunities of building complex, large-scale equipment and structures.

programme.title: Wild Shots
programme.desc: Tim Harmsen trains at Summit Point, testing rapid-fire shooting and vehicle combat tactics. At Fort Sumter, he reflects on the Civil War’s legacy with a 100-gun salute. Then it’s off to Avidity Arms, where Rob Pincus joins him to explore real-world home defense. From tactical holsters to high-speed vehicle drills, Tim puts it all to the test in a live-fire evolution under pressure.

programme.title: Like a Train
programme.desc: In Like a Train, the award-winning documentary that began as a student film project, you will follow the Clearwater Knights, a high school football team determined to have a perfect, undefeated season and to have fun doing it. With a coaching prodigy, not even twenty-five years old, at the helm, leading the team alongside his best friend, the Knights are a unique blend of humor, tenacity and heart. Their story will excite you, move you and make you think about things you didn’t expect out of a sports documentary. Its original score, also composed and performed by the students, will have you tapping your feet as you root for the Knights. Like a Train isn’t just about football, it’s about life, love and people.

programme.title: Real Man TV
programme.desc: Ziplining in Colorado’s Gorges, free falls and donuts. The Real Man show is back in full swing in Colorado. Kyle is joined by special guests and American Patriots as he explores what thrills and adventures this amazing country has to offer. And he’s just getting started.

programme.title: Real Man TV
programme.desc: In the last episode, Kyle took to the skies; now it’s the seas. Co-host Josh Peterson joins Kyle on a deep sea fishing excursion that ends in one of them losing their lunch.. but who will it be? Later (after everyone’s cleaned up) the gang reconvenes for a legendary course of fire with some serious artillery.. and Bob.

programme.title: Boom America
programme.desc: Kevin Harrington and Toli Cefail meet with the team at Advanced Vitality to explore the cutting edge of preventative healthcare. programme.title: The Big Reveal
programme.desc: Laura Zaspel (Farm Hero) takes you inside the cockpit for a high-flying look at the future of farming. From cutting-edge aerial applications to next-gen science and sustainability, Air Tractor’s technology is redefining how we grow from the ground up.

programme.title: Fortress
programme.desc: In the premiere of Fortress, Sheriff Mark Lamb and co-hosts explore America’s urgent need for security—both personal and societal. They meet a passionate team turning donated land into a homestead that feeds and shelters trafficking survivors. Then, CCW Safe steps in to showcase how legal protection for concealed carriers can be the line between justice and ruin. Powerful stories of resilience, protection, and purpose unfold in this compelling first episode.

programme.title: All Stars
programme.desc: The challenges have only gotten started. In episode two, the two teams must go beyond their limits to come out on top. From the brutal Blah line to chopping down trees with only a small ax, it’s a battle for points that’ll take immense willpower to see to the end.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: In the Season 2 premiere of Surviving Mann you'll meet The Black Team and The Blue Team—12 tough-as-nails contestants who will take on everything Don could throw at them even after seeing Season 1! Co-host Sheriff Mark Lamb jumps in to bring advanced law enforcement training tactics & strategies to the evolution line-up.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: Episode 2 is star-studded and action-packed! Get ready for amazing celebrity guests; and you know Don and Sheriff Lamb won't be giving the contestants a break. The challenges keep coming as SAR USA brings in a former FBI agent & trainer to put our contestants through an adrenaline-pumping exercise. Will all the contestants make it through the day? Watch now to find out!

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: Brace yourself for an edge-of-your-seat Tyrolean traverse (a horizontal ladder) over—and occasionally plunging into—the alligator occupied lake. Then, watch as our celebrity shooters and special guests unleash the power of some truly formidable machinery.

programme.title: All Stars
programme.desc: After a grueling night braving the elements, the second half of the challenge continues. The All-Stars and Space Cowboys are pushed to the limit when they are tasked with fabricating their own survival structures. Then, catastrophe strikes on the rope climbs, a timber hitch tests the group’s endurance and the day finishes off with Uncle Sam’s Misguided Children’s stress course. Will the All-Stars make it through? Only time will tell.

programme.title: All Stars
programme.desc: A Finnish defense course tests the contestants' marksmanship and combat medical training. Later, Don serves dinner with a twist. To cap off the competition, the two teams face off in a sniper hide “cat and mouse” challenge. Find out who wins this legendary All-Star competition.

programme.title: Surviving Mann

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: If the previous day wasn’t physically challenging enough, Donn kicks off this episode with a mad dash for individual points. Next, the contestants and celebrity guests are tested with a unique course of fire. As an added treat, a Black-Hawk-Down pilot and war hero introduces the contestants to “The Glove”.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: Mann announces a reconnaissance and surveillance mission is imminent. The contestants are then tasked with electing a mission commander, while another top-notch competitor joins their ranks. Next, it’s not a day on Surviving Mann without a little physical training and a unique course of fire equipped with a folding AR.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: Don tests the competitors with the most grueling Log PT in the history of Surviving Mann and Surviving Mann All Stars. From there, a brand new Cobalt rifle makes the new course of fire a breeze.

programme.title: Beyond the Close
programme.desc: 10 of the country’s top realtors gather to begin a career-defining competition. Guided by a team of all-star business experts, these super-agents will be put to the ultimate test, to prove they have what it takes to rise to the very top and be number one. Follow them... Beyond The Close.

programme.title: Real Man TV
programme.desc: Ziplining in Colorado’s Gorges, free falls and donuts. The Real Man show is back in full swing in Colorado. Kyle is joined by special guests and American Patriots as he explores what thrills and adventures this amazing country has to offer. And he’s just getting started.

programme.title: Boom America
programme.desc: This week is all about health and wellness. Kyle Reyes is back with Nuethix for an inspection into the inner workings of their company.. and his health. Then, the team gets a closer look at Dr. Price’s chiropractor practice and his unique start to the vitamin operations game. Then, get your questions about Clear Water quenched as we take a deeper dive into the company and their global legacy. To cap off the episode, two A-Team members head over to check out Stream2Sea’s innovative factory.

programme.title: Farm Hero
programme.desc: In the season premiere of Farm Hero, host Laura Zaspel scours the country for the best farming practices and the people behind them. Her search winds her up in Gunnison Colorado at Parker pastures. Bill Parker and his daughters are fighting desertification with their grass-fed livestock. Using a collaboration with local farmers, Bill fights against the stigma of livestock farming with a holistic approach. Parker pastures breathes new air into the concept of farm-to-table.

programme.title: Farm Hero
programme.desc: In the season premiere of Farm Hero, host Laura Zaspel scours the country for the best farming practices and the people behind them. Her search winds her up in Gunnison Colorado at Parker pastures. Bill Parker and his daughters are fighting desertification with their grass-fed livestock. Using a collaboration with local farmers, Bill fights against the stigma of livestock farming with a holistic approach. Parker pastures breathes new air into the concept of farm-to-table.

programme.title: Like a Train
programme.desc: Overconfidence can doom a season and the Knights meet their biggest obstacle of the year. Were they ready or not? Why was Coach Jesse so upset on Halloween night?

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: Richard Myers is a jack-of-all-trades on the offensive line with an incredibly strong work ethic. He’s already college football material. The problem? He lives in the middle of a small town in Indiana and needs help getting recruited. Come and see Coach Jesse and Richard bond over fishing and a good old-fashioned Indiana demolition derby as they discuss how to work towards Richard’s future and dreams for his football career.

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: With over 30 scholarship offers and a spot in his high school's Hall of Fame, Mario Eugenio is living proof that hard work and dedication pays off. But what happens when things don't go as planned? Find out in this episode of Country Ball.

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: In this episode of Country Ball you'll meet Kayleb Wagner who broke the Florida state high-school rushing record held by Alabama alumni Derrick Henry, now a Tennessee Titan, and one of the NFL’s most dominant running backs. Showered with media attention, like most all-time record breakers, Kayleb was now a de facto superstar and destined to be bombarded with scholarship offers. But only one came and was then withdrawn. Why? Because despite his athletic and academic prowess, Kayleb has one arm. Hear Kayleb’s story in his own words, and the words of his amazing mom Sam, where he’s been, what he’s doing now, and most importantly, where he’s going.

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: The first part of the season finale starts now. Jesse’s back on his home turf of Clearwater, Florida, at Clearwater Academy International with not one, but TWO of his top players: Luca Stanzani and Dylan Djeté – who’ve both been playing football since they were little. Dylan’s a family-oriented player who got five touchdowns across his first two games in America. Luca’s been CAI’s starting quarterback since eighth grade and has both the brains and the dedication to go far. See just what these players can do in this episode of Country Ball!

programme.title: The Big Reveal
programme.desc: Take flight with The Big Reveal as Don Mann (Surviving Mann), Sheriff Mark Lamb (Surviving Mann), and Laura Zaspel (Farm Hero) visit Air Tractor—America’s iconic maker of crop dusters, firefighting, and military aircraft. Witness the power, precision, and pride behind the company proving that American craftsmanship still soars.

programme.title: The Big Reveal
programme.desc: Laura Zaspel (Farm Hero) takes you inside the cockpit for a high-flying look at the future of farming. From cutting-edge aerial applications to next-gen science and sustainability, Air Tractor’s technology is redefining how we grow from the ground up.

programme.title: Farm Hero
programme.desc: The rain simulator is up and running and the results are shocking. But where do we go from here? How do we fix what’s broken and return to farming with Mother Nature and not against it? Wayne Swanson in Chattanooga Tennessee has some answers. This special episode of Farm Hero highlights the important mission American farmers are on tackling to protect and revitalize our soil… with the help of some Swiss Army Bugs.

programme.title: Farm Hero
programme.desc: In part one of the season finale, Laura is immersing herself in all the wonders that are TomKat ranch. Created by Kat Taylor and Tom Steyer, TomKat ranch is part ranch, part laboratory, part educational facility and all around the American Dream. This ranch is doing their part at spear-heading the rural revitalization that will bring about climate stability and a healthier planet.

programme.title: Beyond the Close
programme.desc: 10 of the country’s top realtors gather to begin a career-defining competition. Guided by a team of all-star business experts, these super-agents will be put to the ultimate test, to prove they have what it takes to rise to the very top and be number one. Follow them... Beyond The Close.

programme.title: The Big Reveal
programme.desc: The first episode of The Big Reveal kicks off with a bang or rather, a jolt, as Compliant Technologies premieres their newest gadget for pioneering the safety of police officers and civilians alike. Next, Kevin Harrington meets with two individuals that Unlock Math for children around the world. Later, Sheriff Mark Lamb sits down with Bonnie from Off Duty Police Officers for a look at her streamlining systems.

programme.title: The Big Reveal
programme.desc: The Big Reveal does it again by bringing three very different entrepreneurs together, all connected by their pioneer spirit. Flag Guard tips off this episode by explaining how they’re doing their part in keeping your loved ones safe. After that, Dr. West explains how his revolutionary probiotic will fix your digestive health 100% of the time. Host Kevin Harrington then caps off this episode in style with a trip to Tommasina Eyewear’s studio with a peak behind the curtain.

programme.title: Boom America
programme.desc: Today, Kevin and Toli sit down with a new batch of business owners looking to grow and thrive. This first business owner is the heart of America personified. Mark Baylis founded Valor for struggling veterans around America and now it’s time for the A-team to help him scale his mission to reach more patriots in need. From there, the team touch base with a rough and tumble businessman who brings bespoke adventure experiences to life. After that, the pioneers of STAYCA VACA bring their niche business model to the team for evaluation. Then, Compliant Tech caps off the day with a shock to the system.

programme.title: Boom America
programme.desc: It’s time to break down what the A-Team has learned from our latest group of companies—and how we can best support them in reaching their goals. Today, the spotlight is on A-Team member Larry Ward of Market Rithm. This seasoned CEO has seen it all when it comes to marketing strategy—and he’s got the accolades to prove it. Now, he’s setting his sights on helping businesses gain a competitive edge in their marketing efforts. Next, we’re introduced to another powerhouse on Kevin’s team: Nate Bailey, founder of Unleash the Leader Within. Nate brings a dynamic, personalized approach to scaling businesses that have often been overlooked. Rounding out this insightful roundtable discussion are A-Team members Chandler Kline from PICMII Crowdfunding and podcaster Dr. Jason Dean, each contributing their own unique areas of expertise.

programme.desc: We’re back with Valor Clinic to take a deeper look at the inner workings of their foundation, which supports financially struggling veterans. Next, we take a quick trip to the tropics to catch Aggressor Adventures in action. Kyle Reyes checks in with owner Wayne for an update on how he’s been implementing the A-Team’s sage advice. To wrap things up, Kyle Reyes stops by Compliant Technologies to experience their innovative product firsthand. And of course, we wouldn’t leave without a live demo of their shockingly advanced invention—The G.L.O.V.E.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: The contestants are T-minus one day out from the critical mission and the heat is on. But before that, it wouldn’t be a Surviving Mann episode without some intensive PT. With a crash-course on how to build a sniper’s hide under their belts, the teams get their chance to get their hands dirty.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: After another grueling PT session, the contestants are pushed to their limits with a new course of fire courtesy of Stag Arms. From long range, 500 yards, to standing, kneeling and a 100 meter dash- will anyone complete this challenging course of fire? After that, the teams are put through extensive land nav training.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: The moment the contestants have been training for is finally here. But when a surveillance mission turns into a CQB, the contestants have to put all their training to the test. Find out who won Surviving Mann Season Two and who was the MVP of the season.

Come and see Coach Jesse and Richard bond over fishing and a good old-fashioned Indiana demolition derby as they discuss how to work towards Richard’s future and dreams for his football career.

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: With over 30 scholarship offers and a spot in his high school's Hall of Fame, Mario Eugenio is living proof that hard work and dedication pays off. But what happens when things don't go as planned? Find out in this episode of Country Ball.

programme.title: Like a Train
programme.desc: Overconfidence can doom a season and the Knights meet their biggest obstacle of the year. Were they ready or not? Why was Coach Jesse so upset on Halloween night?

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: Coach Jesse heads to Little Rock Arkansas, home of the famous Pulaski Academy and super-star high school football coach, Coach Kelly. The player? Joe Himon. With NFL speed and skills already, a heart of gold and courage to match, Joe has yet to commit and be recognized as the top rated recruit he should be. Find out what advice and help Coach Jesse has for Joe in this episode of Country Ball.

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: Meet Ryan Nolan, a hardworking, talented play-maker with integrity and intelligence to match. Unfortunately, at only 5’ 9”, his size has kept him off of many coaches' radar. Find out what strategies Coach Jesse has for Ryan to help him get scholarship offers and follow them on their shooting adventure as they compete to see who’s the fastest shot in this episode of Country Ball.

programme.title: Like a Train
programme.desc: In Like a Train, the award-winning documentary that began as a student film project, you will follow the Clearwater Knights, a high school football team determined to have a perfect, undefeated season and to have fun doing it. With a coaching prodigy, not even twenty-five years old, at the helm, leading the team alongside his best friend, the Knights are a unique blend of humor, tenacity and heart. Their story will excite you, move you and make you think about things you didn’t expect out of a sports documentary. Its original score, also composed and performed by the students, will have you tapping your feet as you root for the Knights. Like a Train isn’t just about football, it’s about life, love and people.

Showered with media attention, like most all-time record breakers, Kayleb was now a de facto superstar and destined to be bombarded with scholarship offers. But only one came and was then withdrawn. Why? Because despite his athletic and academic prowess, Kayleb has one arm. Hear Kayleb’s story in his own words, and the words of his amazing mom Sam, where he’s been, what he’s doing now, and most importantly, where he’s going.

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: The first part of the season finale starts now. Jesse’s back on his home turf of Clearwater, Florida, at Clearwater Academy International with not one, but TWO of his top players: Luca Stanzani and Dylan Djeté – who’ve both been playing football since they were little. Dylan’s a family-oriented player who got five touchdowns across his first two games in America. Luca’s been CAI’s starting quarterback since eighth grade and has both the brains and the dedication to go far. See just what these players can do in this episode of Country Ball!

programme.title: Like a Train
programme.desc: The Knights continue down the path to victory. Their journey must include team growth and bonding. Friendships and trust develop as the team goes through hardships such as injuries and new players. Along the way, we learn more about them, why they work so well together, whom they've lost, and how they've charged forth in spite of it all. Oh, and there's rain, lots of rain. Meet the team and hear their stories. They will excite you, move you and make you think about things you didn’t expect out of a sports documentary. Its original score, also composed and performed by the students, will have you tapping your feet as you root for the Knights.

programme.title: The Big Reveal
programme.desc: The Big Reveal does it again by bringing three very different entrepreneurs together, all connected by their pioneer spirit. Flag Guard tips off this episode by explaining how they’re doing their part in keeping your loved ones safe. After that, Dr. West explains how his revolutionary probiotic will fix your digestive health 100% of the time. Host Kevin Harrington then caps off this episode in style with a trip to Tommasina Eyewear’s studio with a peak behind the curtain.

programme.title: Real Man TV
programme.desc: Ziplining in Colorado’s Gorges, free falls and donuts. The Real Man show is back in full swing in Colorado. Kyle is joined by special guests and American Patriots as he explores what thrills and adventures this amazing country has to offer. And he’s just getting started.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: Episode 2 is star-studded and action-packed! Get ready for amazing celebrity guests; and you know Don and Sheriff Lamb won't be giving the contestants a break. The challenges keep coming as SAR USA brings in a former FBI agent & trainer to put our contestants through an adrenaline-pumping exercise. Will all the contestants make it through the day? Watch now to find out!

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: Brace yourself for an edge-of-your-seat Tyrolean traverse (a horizontal ladder) over—and occasionally plunging into—the alligator occupied lake. Then, watch as our celebrity shooters and special guests unleash the power of some truly formidable machinery.

programme.title: All Stars
programme.desc: It’s a new day, which means Don takes the contestants' training to new heights..literally. But first, the All-Stars are split into teams for a searching mission, using Offgrid’s Faraday bags. Later, they’re introduced to the new ropes course, “The Odyssey”, to test their mental and physical fortitude, as well as their endurance, using a climbing wall. See who rises to the occasion and who suffers from "paralysis by over analysis” in this episode.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: Surviving Mann contestants are the best of the best. But even they had no idea what they were in for when put through their paces by Don Mann.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: In this episode, we find out exactly what Don meant by... all of that was a cover story.... What does Don really have in store for the 32?

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: Kyle and Caleb give the skinny on the hamstring pull that was heard around the world. From there, Surviving Mann fans get a glimpse at just how far Faraday containers can go to protect your security, privacy and device. After, Black Aces does a deep dive into their available products and some exciting plans for the future.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: For physical training, Don does something unexpected when he hands over the reins to a contestant to lead. One would think that would make for an easy go of it, if it weren’t for the 3-time Olympian that was now in charge. Next, co-host Mike Glover leads Surviving Mann’s first ever After-Action report to debrief the previous night’s mission. Afterwards, the infamous Blah line makes its season debut to the contestants’ chagrin.

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: In this episode, competitor James gives us an update on how his injuries are progressing and how he’s able to push through when most thought he would be long gone. Luckily for the competitors, he had a special demonstration ready that involved hollow points and gel blocks. Later, Matthew recaps his experience with “The Glove”. To cap things off, Chris also sits down with BodyHz to talk about innovations in the non-chemical health industry.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: Episode 6 kicks off with some much anticipated weapons training and tactical shooting. Armed with some killer Black Aces shotguns, the teams are challenged with a unique course of fire. From there, Athlon Optics and Modern Pneumatic Sporting Devices configure a hunting air rifle for the contestants to play with.

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: Competitors Stephen and Danny sit down to recap the best and worst moments so far in the season. Also, Chris and Cindy sit down with Compliant Technologies’ founder to get the backstory on how the innovative product that is sweeping the nation (and terrorizing the contestants) came to be. Then Dr. West drops some truth bombs on the state of the average human body’s blood.

programme.title: Surviving Mann
programme.desc: The wrath of Mann is upon the contestants as Don doles out punishments to the entire squad for one person’s mistake. On the tails of the punishment, Don leads everyone in a lesson on BUD/S training. Later, co-host and retired Green Beret, Mike Glover, gives the contestants a life lesson on survival they won’t soon forget. To top off the episode, one of the contestants demonstrates his industry-changing hollow point bullets in some meaty targets.

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: Viewers get an inside scoop on the creation of Modern Pneumatic Air Rifles and their origin story. Spoiler Alert, it involves a big game hunt in South Africa. Next, Athlon Optics goes over how they’ve revolutionized Hog Hunting and thermal optics as a whole. Later, we get a look at the leader board and how close the race is going into the finale.

programme.title: The Big Reveal
programme.desc: Sheriff Mark Lamb (Surviving Mann) and UFC Hall of Famer Ken Shamrock (Surviving Mann) uncover a breakthrough changing how we live in a world full of invisible forces. Join them as Aires Tech reveals the science behind a revolutionary technology built to protect the human body from electromagnetic stress—empowering performance in a wired world.

programme.title: The Big Reveal
programme.desc: From the ocean to the lab, The Big Reveal dives deeper into the hidden impact of electromagnetic pollution. Discover how Aires Tech is helping people, animals, and even bees thrive—unlocking the secrets to balance, vitality, and true wellness in our connected age.

programme.title: All Stars
programme.desc: The day starts off with some unique courses of fire that get the All Stars’ blood pumping. With the help of Rogue Ops, New Frontier Armory and Griffin Armament, the teams are outfitted with the most premiere artillery in the industry. Then, the All Stars get out of the heat and head indoors to do some CQC training with Surviving Mann alum, Randy Couture. If anyone thought it would be a break.. they were surely mistaken.

programme.title: All Stars
programme.desc: It’s a new day, which means Don takes the contestants' training to new heights..literally. But first, the All-Stars are split into teams for a searching mission, using Offgrid’s Faraday bags. Later, they’re introduced to the new ropes course, “The Odyssey”, to test their mental and physical fortitude, as well as their endurance, using a climbing wall. See who rises to the occasion and who suffers from "paralysis by over analysis” in this episode.

programme.title: Wild Shots
programme.desc: This episode of Wildshots kicks off in South Carolina, where Tim Harmsen goes behind the scenes at Jacob Grey Firearms for an inside look at precision craftsmanship in action. Known for their stunning 2011 pistols—true works of art—Jacob Grey takes perfection to the micron. From raw metal to “The Hex,” Tim witnesses how engineering meets artistry to create one of America’s most elite handguns.

programme.title: Wild Shots
programme.desc: Tim heads to the Smoky Mountains for an action-packed adventure that’s as sharp as it gets. The journey kicks off at the world-famous Smoky Mountain Knife Works, the largest knife store on the planet, where Tim explores the artistry and precision behind the blades of We Knife. There, he reconnects with shooting legend Kyle Lamb, who shares his thoughts on the craftsmanship that keeps professionals equipped for anything. The action continues at Buds Gun Shop, where Tim joins Kyle once again to complete two of Lamb’s signature courses—the intense “Chaos Drill” and the dynamic “Triple Threat.” Together, they test speed, accuracy, and the mental discipline needed to master the range. But the day wouldn’t be complete without a little backwoods ingenuity. IraqVeteran8888 joins Tim for a bit of unconventional fun—combining creativity, curiosity, and some good old Redneck Science to wrap up an unforgettable episode.

programme.title: Like a Train
programme.desc: The Knights will face their biggest challenge yet. There be giants.

programme.title: Beyond the Close
programme.desc: Ladies and gentlemen, it's time to close the deal on Beyond the Close! Join us for the grand finale and winner celebration episode, where we'll reveal the triumphant super-agent who has risen to the very top of the competition. But that's not all. Get ready to hear firsthand from the contestants themselves as they reflect on their 90-day journey and share their growth, learnings, and future aspirations. It's a night of triumph, tears, and unforgettable moments as we bid farewell to the most thrilling season yet. And as if that wasn't enough, we have a very special guest in store. The one and only Christine Quinn, star of Netflix's Selling Sunset, will be joining us for the festivities. She'll be sharing her insights on the industry and giving us a glimpse into what it takes to be a top realtor. But wait, there's more! We'll be taking you on an exclusive tour of some of Miami's most luxurious properties, hosted by none other than some of America's top developers and agents. So sit back, relax, and get ready to be transported beyond the close.

programme.title: Wild Shots
programme.desc: In this episode of Wildshots, host Tim Harmsen heads to Sig Sauer for an exclusive look inside one of America’s most advanced firearms manufacturing facilities. With a motto of “Every day you wake up and get a little better,” Sig Sauer lives up to its words—producing over 5,000 firearms a day with cutting-edge robotics and precision automation. After a full factory tour, Tim hits Sig’s state-of-the-art testing range to get hands-on with the legendary XM250 machine gun, pushing the limits of modern firepower. Then it’s time for some pure shooting mastery as Tim meets up with friend and firearms influencer 22Plinkster. Known for his unbelievable accuracy and showmanship, 22Plinkster ups the ante—splitting playing cards with a .22 bullet, upside down, and even splitting a single bullet mid-flight to hit two separate targets at once. Finally, the episode caps off with a nod to Hollywood as Tim checks out the Genesis Arms machinery seen in John Wick, blending cinematic cool with real-world firepower.

programme.title: Wild Shots
programme.desc: Host Tim Harmsen teams up with SEAL Team 6 legend Don Mann to tackle real-world defense tactics and home-clearing techniques. A visit to Civil War battlefields connects history to modern freedoms, while the brutal 5-Year AR Challenge pushes an AR-15 through 10,000 rounds without cleaning. Will the rifle survive—or fail under fire?

programme.title: Country Ball
programme.desc: Meet Ryan Nolan, a hardworking, talented play-maker with integrity and intelligence to match. Unfortunately, at only 5’ 9”, his size has kept him off of many coaches' radar. Find out what strategies Coach Jesse has for Ryan to help him get scholarship offers and follow them on their shooting adventure as they compete to see who’s the fastest shot in this episode of Country Ball.

programme.title: The Big Reveal
programme.desc: Step into the heart of innovation with The Big Reveal! Join Sheriff Mark Lamb and MMA legend Ken Shamrock as they explore groundbreaking American companies revolutionizing their industries. From elite camo designed through deer vision science to lightweight titanium firearm suppressors and EMF-neutralizing tech for peak performance—each story uncovers passion, ingenuity, and grit. Discover what’s shaping America’s entrepreneurial spirit. It’s not just business. It’s The Big Reveal.

programme.title: Wild Shots
programme.desc: Host Tim Harmsen teams up with SEAL Team 6 legend Don Mann to tackle real-world defense tactics and home-clearing techniques. A visit to Civil War battlefields connects history to modern freedoms, while the brutal 5-Year AR Challenge pushes an AR-15 through 10,000 rounds without cleaning. Will the rifle survive—or fail under fire?

programme.title: Farm Hero
programme.desc: Laura’s search for farm heroes leads her to White Cloud, Kansas to meet with Ray Archuleta who is inspiring an entire generation of agricultural trailblazers. In order to prove how vital soil health is to farming, Ray and Laura get their hands dirty in the fields to collect samples. With three samples in tow, its back to the lab they go to try out Ray’s rain simulator. How will the farm samples stack up? Let’s find out.

programme.title: Greatest Sports Legends Then and Now - Triumphs and Tragedies
programme.desc: Fun, fast-paced debate talk series comparing the sports legends of the past to sports titans of the present. Wes and Murph look at several exhilarating moments in sports, as well as some devastating incidents, all of which became etched in sports fans’ memories forever.

programme.title: Greatest Sports Legends Then and Now - Tragedies
programme.desc: Fun, fast-paced debate talk series comparing the sports legends of the past to sports titans of the present. Wes and Murph discuss some of the unfortunate tragedies that have shaken the sports world to this day.

programme.title: Greatest Sports Legends Then and Now - Fascinating but Forgotten
programme.desc: Fun, fast-paced debate talk series comparing the sports legends of the past to sports titans of the present. Wes and Murph discuss hidden stories that most people don’t know about, including a tennis player who served as a spy during World War II.

programme.title: Greatest Sports Legends Then and Now - Overlooked and Underrated
programme.desc: Fun, fast-paced debate talk series comparing the sports legends of the past to sports titans of the present. Wes and Murph look at surprising teams that unexpectedly won it all, as well as some championship teams that have long been forgotten.

programme.title: Greatest Sports Legends Then and Now - Fan Mail
programme.desc: Fun, fast-paced debate talk series comparing the sports legends of the past to sports titans of the present. Wes and Murph receive a barrage of fan mail questions, to which they reveal their personal opinions about the worst NFL draft busts; best nickname in sports; greatest upsets, and much more.

programme.title: Greatest Sports Legends Then and Now - True Confessions
programme.desc: Fun, fast-paced debate talk series comparing the sports legends of the past to sports titans of the present. Wes and Murph examine some amazing stories from legendary athletes, such as when Reggie Jackson asked A’s owner, Charlie Finlay for a raise; or why Jim Brown loved playing for the Cleveland Browns.

programme.desc: Encouraging others brings healing power to those around you. As you help them rise, God will lift you higher.

programme.title: Breaking Control
programme.desc: Your destiny is too great for unhealthy relationships. Set boundaries, and God will help you thrive.

programme.title: You Are Very Powerful
programme.desc: What seems big can be defeated; God's resurrection power within you makes you powerful enough.

programme.title: When The Water Breaks
programme.desc: Trials signal new beginnings. The process may be tough, but you're about to give birth to new dreams!

programme.title: An Atmosphere Of Praise
programme.desc: Praise attracts favor, healing, and abundance, inviting God to show up in your life. Create that atmosphere!

programme.title: Night Seasons
programme.desc: Don't let tough times make you think your best days are behind you. God has something amazing ahead!

programme.title: Keep The Right Identity
programme.desc: Your environment doesn't define you. Wherever you are, you are a child of God crowned with His favor.

programme.title: The Secret Place
programme.desc: Don’t let small things steal your joy. Protect your heart’s secret place for greater peace!

programme.title: Overflow With Hope
programme.desc: Overflowing with hope brings expectancy. Even unseen, trust that God will do something extraordinary!

programme.title: Remember What God Said
programme.desc: Under pressure, focus on what you think. Dismiss negativity and remember God's promises will come to pass.

programme.title: Sing To The Promise
programme.desc: Just as a seed needs water, God's promises need your faith to grow. Stand in faith for His promises!

programme.title: The Power Of Favor
programme.desc: God's favor can take you further than you imagine. Expect to see His hand of favor in your life today.

programme.title: You Are Fully Loaded
programme.desc: You are strategically designed by God to fulfill your purpose. Be confident you are equipped for your destiny.

programme.title: Stay On The Potter's Wheel
programme.desc: God uses uncomfortable moments to prepare you for promotion and refine your character for His blessings!

programme.title: Feed Your Faith
programme.desc: Nurture your faith and seek spiritual growth and resilience through intentional practices.

programme.title: Don't Be Defined By Your Mistakes
programme.desc: God's mercy is greater than any mistake. Don't let your past define your future; receive His mercy today!

programme.title: Generational Breakthroughs
programme.desc: Faith can transform legacies and break cycles of limitation.

programme.title: It's All Good
programme.desc: No setback or past mistake can control your destiny. God knows how to work all things together for your good.

programme.title: I Still Believe
programme.desc: To see God's promise fulfilled, you may need to go from 'I believe' to 'I still believe.' It's on the way!

programme.title: Look Again
programme.desc: It’s time to stir up the gifts inside you! What God started in your life, He will always finish.

programme.title: By This Time Next Year
programme.desc: Even when you see no change, God is working behind the scenes. Get ready for Him to show out in your life.

programme.title: Miracles Out of Mistakes
programme.desc: No mistake is too great for God. Shake off guilt, move forward, and trust His best plan for your life.

programme.title: Taking Care Of Yourself
programme.desc: Don't let life deplete you. Prioritize self-care to better embrace all that God has for you.

programme.title: Be Comfortable Not Knowing
programme.desc: With an attitude of faith, even without all the answers, God will show up in amazing ways!

programme.title: Today Is Your Day
programme.desc: True faith means expecting God's favor now. Start each day expecting His goodness!

programme.title: Prepared In The Process
programme.desc: Feeling discouraged? God is working behind the scenes. Don’t give up; your future is being prepared!

programme.title: Nothing Missing
programme.desc: What limited you in the past won't limit your future. When God restores, nothing in your life will be missing!

programme.title: Abiding Not Striving
programme.desc: You don't have to make everything happen alone. Trust God, and He will open the right doors in your life.

programme.title: Have A Spirit Of Honor
programme.desc: Honor those around you to sow seeds of blessing for your future. Make time for the people in your life!

programme.title: Serve Your Way Up
programme.desc: Your purpose is found in serving others, not self-promotion. Serving sows seeds for your future.

programme.title: Your Move When Life's Unfair
programme.desc: Don’t let one bad season keep you from pursuing your destiny. God wants to do something new in your life.

programme.title: The God Who Crosses His Arms
programme.desc: Ephesians 1:5 says God adopted us into His family. Because of this, you’ll receive blessings and favor.

programme.title: Keep The Faith
programme.desc: Trust in God's promises for a brighter future.

programme.title: Recognize Who You Are
programme.desc: Don't let a distorted self-image hinder your purpose. God gave you all you need to reach destiny.

programme.title: Don’t Believe The Lies
programme.desc: Reject negative beliefs, embrace your true potential and God's promises.

programme.title: Your Place Of Blessing
programme.desc: Change is God guiding you to blessings. You're stepping into greater favor, opportunity, and provision.

programme.title: Recognize God's Goodness
programme.desc: God has worked for generations. Step into His favor—He empowers you for an abundant life!

programme.title: Dealing With Negative Thoughts
programme.desc: Our thoughts can limit or empower us. Focus on God's promises to be empowered to reach your destiny.

programme.title: Help From Heaven
programme.desc: We all face challenges we don't think we can overcome. God will send help from Heaven to defeat our enemies.

programme.title: It's Already Setup
programme.desc: God has your life planned. Stay in faith and the right people and opportunities will come to you.

programme.title: Your Destiny Outweights Your History
programme.desc: What God has for your future is greater than your past. He'll bring you out better than before!

programme.title: Divine Surprises
programme.desc: What God has planned for you is more rewarding than you can imagine.

programme.title: No More Hiding
programme.desc: God created you to shine and make a difference. Don't hide your gifts due to fear. Let your light shine.

programme.title: You Are Enough
programme.desc: It's easy to feel lacking, but God gave you the right personality and talent to reach your destiny!

programme.title: Living At Rest
programme.desc: Don’t let life's circumstances steal your peace. Guard your energy, and God will fight your battles!

programme.title: Surrender The Outcome
programme.desc: To live as a mature believer, we have surrender our will to what God ultimately has planned for our lives.

programme.title: Grace For Gethsemane
programme.desc: Divine strength can help navigate personal Gethsemane moments and find peace amidst turmoil.

programme.title: Overcoming Weariness
programme.desc: Don't let weariness block your blessings. Let God strengthen you in every area of your life!

programme.title: How To Handle Troublemakers
programme.desc: God is a vindicator. When you honor Him by taking the high road, He'll fight your battles for you.

programme.title: The Valley Of Blessing
programme.desc: Nothing is a surprise to God. In the middle of trouble, He will prepare a table of abundance for you.

programme.title: Gladly Welcomed
programme.desc: God’s approval of you is not based on your performance. He welcomes you gladly because you are His child.

programme.title: A Transfer Is Coming
programme.desc: God has prepared favor and provision for your future. As you honor Him, His blessings will overtake you.

programme.title: The Good Who Exceeds Expectations
programme.desc: What God has planned for you is greater than anything you've ever dreamed.

programme.title: Your Set Time For Favor
programme.desc: God has set aside special times to show out in your life. Get ready for a new season of His favor!

programme.title: Are You Listening?
programme.desc: God is always speaking—are you listening? Let His voice guide your path!

programme.title: Calling Over Comfort
programme.desc: God may call you to leave the familiar for the unknown. Push past fear, and He'll make the impossible happen.

programme.title: Windows Of Grace
programme.desc: God offers special moments of favor. Step into this grace, and doors will open to take you to a new level!

programme.title: Feed Your Destiny
programme.desc: "Be mindful of what you let into your spirit. In difficulties, sow seeds of greatness for your future!"

programme.title: An Expected End
programme.desc: God can use setbacks as a setup for your future. Stay in faith. He’s already planned your victory!

programme.title: A Fresh Anointing
programme.desc: Seek renewed strength and purpose through divine empowerment in your life.

programme.title: Commanded To Be Blessed
programme.desc: Nothing can stop God's blessing in your life. One touch of His favor will get you where you belong!

programme.title: Call Out The King In You
programme.desc: Each one of us has a King on the inside. Only God can show you how to let that king reign in your life.

programme.title: The Hand Of Blessing
programme.desc: When God blessed you, He marked you for greatness. He wants you to be an example of His goodness to others.

programme.title: Settled Accounts
programme.desc: We face unfair situations, but you're not at the mercy of others. God will settle your accounts!

programme.title: Your Time To Reign
programme.desc: When God created you, He crowned you with favor to overcome obstacles. Trouble is temporary, reign is coming.

programme.title: Blessed In The Dark Places
programme.desc: God can use difficult seasons to take you to new levels. He knows how to turn the trial to your advantage.

programme.title: You Are Going To Laugh Again
programme.desc: No struggle can limit your destiny. God is about to fill you with joy and new laughter.

programme.title: He'll Do It Again
programme.desc: Use what God has done in your life and the Bible as reference points, when believing God for the future.

programme.title: Living In The Present
programme.desc: Focusing on your past can make you miss what God is doing now. Don't overlook His present blessings!

programme.title: Stop Counting On People
programme.desc: Instead of counting on people learn to count on God. People change, get distracted. God never changes.

programme.title: Grow Through It
programme.desc: God uses difficulties to prepare you for your destiny. You haven't yet seen where He's taking you.

programme.title: Manasseh Is Coming
programme.desc: God wants to bless you so much that you'll forget your past pain. Get ready to be overwhelmed by His goodness.

programme.title: Start A Blessing
programme.desc: Our decisions affect not just us, but our legacy. Honor God, and your faithfulness impacts future generations!

programme.title: You've Been Chosen
programme.desc: Before you were born, God chose and equipped you with all you need to fulfill His calling on your life.

programme.title: Stronger Than You Think
programme.desc: God has equipped you with the strength to overcome every obstacle. That challenge won't defeat you!

programme.title: Healed Through Humility
programme.desc: To have flourishing relationships, walk in humility. Overlook offenses, let go of being right for blessings.

programme.title: Your Future Is Set
programme.desc: Your future is secure in God's hands. What He promised will come to pass!

programme.title: Let It Go
programme.desc: To fulfill your destiny, let go of negativity. God knows how to redeem everything you've been through!

programme.title: You Lack Nothing
programme.desc: God has given you everything you need to reach your destiny.

programme.title: You Have A Defender
programme.desc: Let God be your defender. Don't waste energy on wrongs. Trust Him to fight your battles and protect you!

programme.title: God Wastes Nothing
programme.desc: God turns that pain into power, that struggle into strength, that mistake into a miracle.

programme.title: In The Middle Of A Miracle
programme.desc: In tough seasons, remember you're in the middle of a miracle. Your best days are still ahead.

programme.title: Kiss It Goodbye
programme.desc: Let go of old hurts and disappointments. Allow God to heal your past and embrace your destiny.

programme.title: Mountains Turned to Molehills
programme.desc: God is in the business of turning mountains into molehills. He can flatten out what looks impossible in life.

programme.title: Supercharged
programme.desc: You may feel at a disadvantage, but God will supercharge your dreams and make the impossible possible!

programme.title: Daily Direction
programme.desc: "God wants to be part of your daily life. Ask Him for guidance, and He'll lead you to your destiny!"
